name: Kent State University
description: Kent State University is one of America's great public universities. Founded in 1910, Kent State is currently ranked by the Carnegie Foundation among the nation's top 77 public research universities and was recognized by Times Higher Education as being among the top 200 universities in the world. We offer a broad range of acclaimed academic programs and internationally respected faculty and researchers who are dedicated to your success. Approximately 2,000 international students from nearly 100 countries are currently enrolled at KSU. Serious international students who want to get an excellent American education in a safe, easily accessible location choose Kent State University. With a slogan of "Excellence in Action" Kent State offers over 300 degree programs, which include such notable programs as business, history, library science, aeronautics, nursing, liquid crystals, journalism and fashion design. With nearly 30,000 students on the main campus it is one of the largest universities in Ohio. KSU also has one of the oldest and most prestigious honors programs in the United States. There is also a high density of Fortune 500 companies located within 48 kilometers of the campus, which offer opportunities for internships to enhance students' learning.

name: Kookmin University
description: Kookmin University, the first private university after Korea’s independence, was established by Mr. Shin, Ik Hee and other main members of the Shanghai interim government of Korea. Deeply rooted in the four founding principles, humanism, nationalism, culturalism, and industrialism that Mr. Kim, Sung Gon emphasized, Kookmin University has grown into a fixture of the academia of Korea with 23,000 students enrolled. In the midst of the ever changing academic climate and social changes, with selfless dedication from all members of KMU, we strive to become a globally recognized institute by making a world of academia unique to none other than KMU as well as being bold to the changes and challenges ahead. The brand of development KMU thrives for starts from change; a change is a chance and a chance is a challenge. We need to actively deal with changes that we must go through in the process of growth by renovating and challenging ourselves to be prepared for any crises. Now universities of a knowledge base society have entered into a competition that is more severe than ever before.

name: Kyushu Institute of Technology
description: Kyushu Institute of Technology in a university located in Kyushu, Japan and was founded in 1907. The university offers both undergraduate and postgraduate programs and currently benefits of three campuses: Tobata campus, Iizuka campus and Wakamatsu campus.

name: Leeds Beckett University
description:
Looking for a university that makes a difference?

Leeds Beckett helps thousands of people and organisations by providing teaching and research on the issues that matter, from cybercrime to sustainability.

But what really sets LBU apart is that we don’t just focus on your academic learning. We also make sure our students get plenty of real-world experience by working with businesses and employers; and support you at every step in your student journey. This means that when you graduate, you're ready to make a difference in your chosen career.

With a history dating back 200 years, Leeds Beckett has grown into one of the largest and most popular universities in the UK. And we are more than a place to study – we are a community. We have around 26,000 students from 143 countries studying across our two campuses in Leeds.

We are a global university, with an alumni community based in 174 countries around the world.

Our degrees are available to study in-country in Botswana, China, Hong Kong, Malaysia, Mauritius, Nepal, Singapore and Vietnam.

International students can apply for scholarships and receive in-country application support in China, India, Indonesia, Nigeria, Qatar, and Vietnam.

From Law, Business and Sport to Social Sciences, Health and Computing, we have a huge range of subjects to choose from. We teach more than 140 courses at undergraduate level and offer over 200 postgraduate qualifications.

We engage with over 1000 employers every year to make sure our courses reflect the characteristics organisations look for. Many professional bodies and associations accredit, recognise, or endorse Leeds Beckett courses, ensuring that the education offered remains relevant, contemporary and career focused.

We are a university bursting with life in a city that has something for everyone. Studying at Leeds Beckett is an opportunity to earn a world-class degree alongside an unforgettable university experience. Many students enjoy it so much they decide to stay in Leeds after they graduate.

The city of Leeds is located in the middle of the UK, well-connected by transport, including its own airport. It’s a city alive with music, art, theatre, history and lots of cultural events. It’s also a great sporting city, a famous shopping destination, and is a gateway to the beautiful Yorkshire Dales countryside.

Our university is ranked within the top 10 in the UK for facilities (Whatuni Student Choice Awards, 2023). From biomedical and sport science laboratories to our very own mock courtroom and highly acclaimed music studios, we are proud to provide students with the tools and experience you need to thrive.

At LBU, there are many opportunities to settle in and make friends. We provide a ‘Meet and Greet’ service at the airport for all incoming international students, and host events throughout the year for you to meet new people. Whether it’s meeting people in accommodation, on your course, or joining one of our countless clubs and societies (playing sport, watching films, gaming, reading and listening to music, to name just a few), there are so many ways you can get involved.

Beckett Careers helps students and graduates with all aspects of career planning, helping students recognise and develop employability skills.

We will support you after you finish your course too. As a graduate of Leeds Beckett University, you are entitled to use our careers and employability services for up to five years after you leave. It’s all part of our Graduate Promise – to prepare and support you into the working world and beyond.

Join us at Leeds Beckett University and get a future advantage in your career.

name: Lobachevsky University
description:
National Research Lobachevsky State University of Nizhny Novgorod was founded on January 31, 1916 as one of the People’s Universities of Soviet Russia and was the first higher education institution in Nizhny Novgorod.

In 1945, our university was the first in the country to establish its Faculty of Radiophysics, and in 1956,  Research Institute for Radiophysics. The same year, the University was named after Nikolai Lobachevsky, a great Russian mathematician born in Nizhny Novgorod. The country’s first Faculty of Computational Mathematics and Cybernetics was founded at Lobachevsky University in 1963. It was followed by the Research Institute for Applied Mathematics and Cybernetics one year later.

In 2009, Lobachevsky University was awarded a prestigious status of a National Research University.

In 2012,  Lobachevsky University created a complex interdisciplinary research institute, named “Institute of Living Systems”.

In 2013, together with 14 Russian universities, Lobachevsky University was chosen by the Russian government to be a participant in the 5-100 Project (5-100 Initiative) aimed at supporting the universities’ global competitiveness enhancement programmes.

In 2014, the University launched its powerful supercomputer named Lobachevsky at the Research Institute for Applied Mathematics and Cybernetics. The peak performance of Lobachevsky is 570 Tflops: this makes it the third most powerful supercomputer in Russian universities and brings it to the list of the most powerful supercomputers in the world.

Being the participant of a Federal target programme for the development of the medical and pharmaceutical industry, in 2017 the University established its Center for Innovative Development of Medical Instrument Engineering.

The year 2019 marked a new stage in the development of Lobachevsky University’s international campus when a new dormitory was opened with 8 floors of living accommodation, a gym, a student canteen, a first-aid post and rooms for individual studying.

Lobachevsky University has strong international partnership ties with more than 140 agreements. Among its partner universities are University of Ghent, Ca’Foscari University, University of Verona, University of Bologna, University of Turin, High School of Management of Renn-1, Turku University, Huelva University, Masaryk University, etc.

Lobachevsky University actively participates in cooperation with European higher education institutions within the Erasmus+ programme and offers 20 dual degree programmes with 9 partner universities: Oviedo University, Macquarie University, University of Rennes-1, University of Rouen, University of Grenoble-Alpes, University of Calabria, University of Siena, University of Palermo, Turan University.

Lobachevsky University is also a consortium partner in the Erasmus Mundus IMCEERES Programme, which comprises three separate awards from the University of Tartu and the University of Glasgow plus one of the other degree-awarding partners according to the study pathway undertaken.

Lobachevsky University is a host university to 11 projects carried out under the supervision of world-level leading scientists from University of Dusseldorf, University of Leicester, Extreme Light Fields Institute in Paris, etc.

name: Lodz University of Technology
description:
Lodz University of
Technology (TUL) is one of the best universities of technology in Poland. TUL
has over 75 years of tradition and experience in educating engineers. Teaching
is delivered at nine faculties. There are many extra organizational units on
the campus, including venues for
inter-departmental education (International Faculty of Engineering,
Interdisciplinary Doctoral School), sports and recreation, entertainment and a
variety of organizations enriching student life.

TUL fits perfectly
in the direction of the city's development, for which it is an important and
valued partner. TUL is open for the local community, not only for students, but
also for children, youth and seniors - initiatives undertaken by TUL include
e.g.: University of the Third Age, Public Secondary School and Lodz Children's
University. Well-developed cooperation with the socio-economic environment and
significant activities of University for the benefit of the local community
translate into its very good reputation in the Region.

TUL is an attractive
partner for business not only in the region. It cooperates with the largest
companies in the country and abroad. TUL conducts scientific research of the
European standard, create new technologies and inventions in cooperation with
the best scientific establishments all over the world.

TUL is a member of ECIU (European Consortium of Innovative Universities)
working within the European Universities alliances.

Lodz University of Technology has obtained two ABET accreditations for Information Technology and Computer Science programs conducted in English and 25 EUR-ACE  ®   program accreditations (EUR-ACE Bachelor Label and EUR-ACE Master Label). TUL has also undergone an international institutional evaluation under the EUA Institutional Evaluation Program and may use the EUA - IEP quality label recognized throughout Europe. In 2020, TUL was the first university in Poland to be granted international accreditation by the French accreditation body HCERES  for the period of five years.

name: London Metropolitan University
description: London Metropolitan University's mission is to transform lives through the power of education – and it does that by welcoming students from all kinds of backgrounds and supporting them to achieve success. Each and every one of them belongs there and uniquely contributes to the university and the city around them. They are The Real London.This is The Real London.

name: Lviv Polytechnic National University
description: Lviv Polytechnic National University is the oldest technical higher educational institution in Ukraine and East Europe. It was founded in 1816. University consists of 16 institutes, 114 departments; autonomous, additional and general subdivisions. Technical Academy was one of the first technical schools in Europe and first in Ukraine. In 1877 the academy was renamed on High Polytechnic School and was included as higher technical educational institution of the Austro-Hungarian Empire. That new academical year was started in new building located on S. Bandery Str. Since 1921 to 1939 academical institution was called Lviv Polytechnic. After Soviet Power in 1939 it was renamed on Lviv Polytechnic Institut. In June 1993, the year before its 150 anniversary, Lviv Polytechnic Institute get the highest IV accreditation level, university status and name “ Lviv Polytechnic State University”. In 2000 Lviv Polytechnic got National University status . 8 July 2009 the Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine on their meeting designated Lviv Polytechnic National University as a self-management research higher educational institution.

name: Middle East University Jordan
description:
Middle East University (MEU) is a Jordanian national educational research, consulting, non-profit institution, accredited by the Jordanian Ministry of Higher Education. MEU was established in 2005, offering graduate level studies in 3 faculties at the time. In 2007, it went on to offer programs via 9 faculties and 21 departments for both graduate and undergraduate programs.

Our Mission: "Preparing leaders through creating an environment to stimulate learning, scientific research and community service".

Our vision: “Serious. Committed. Seeking to learn”.

Our Objectives:

1. Excellence in international standards of academic research and education. 2. Foster remarkable and knowledgeable members of administrative and teaching staff. 3. Gathering talented and distinguished students belonging to different cultures. 4. Setting up and developing programmes and academic specializations so as to join modern developments in accordance with job market requirements. 5. Enhancing students’ quality skills including the vocational and intellectual ones. 6. Providing and animating inline to administrative and teaching staff and University students in various research fields. 7. Animating and developing the skills and abilities of administrative and teaching staff in accordance with technological and scientific recencies. 8. Encouraging pioneering projects in order to help in invigorating the welfare of society.  9. Uplifting the educational and learning process in harmony with technological and scientific recencies.

name: Mustansiriyah University
description:
Background: Mustansiriyah University is a publicuniversity located to the north of the Baghdad city centre. It was established in1963 and became one of the leading universities in Iraq via thousands graduateswho influenced all aspect of business and research lives either locally orglobally.

A brief history:

Mustansiriyah, a symbol thatreflects the greatness of the Islamic Arab civilization when Baghdad was thehost of the intellectuals and the fountain of Islamic intellectual output. Theoriginal Mustansiriyah Madrasah was established in 1227 by the Abbasid CaliphAl-Mustansir and was one of the oldest universities in the world. The modernMustansiriyah University was established with the help and financial support ofthe Republic of Iraq Teacher’s Union in 1963, mainly providing evening courses.In 1964, the University was given the status of a semi-state institution andsome state financial support and the first batch of students (1077) wasgraduated in 1967. Currently, the university has 13 college and many researchcentres that are supporting undergraduate and postgraduate studies in Medicine,Dentistry, Pharmacy, health, humanities, applied and social sciences, religiousstudies, education and teaching, business and economics, and law and legalstudies.

Equality and diversity: The university acceptsapplicants of both genders from all cultural and social background on an equalbasis irrespective of age, disability, gender, pregnancy or marital status,race, religion or belief.

Education: The universityholds the responsibility of teaching and training leaders in business andresearch who will serve in maintaining a good quality of life and innovations. Theuniversity has an excellent number of qualified staff with master and PhDdegrees. Teaching at the university is combining between practical and theoreticalcourses that prepare competent students able to grasp knowledge for the bestcareer.

Research: The universityhas different well-equipped and well-monitored research laboratories distributedover most of the university scientific institutions. Many research groups haveconducted a variety of recent research subjects in fields of medicine,dentistry, biology, biochemistry, biotechnology and physics. Also, theuniversity has a significant bulk of research in humanities. Most of thisresearch has been published in several peer-reviewed journals. Also, theuniversity has increased its international research collaboration throughhundreds of master and PhD students sponsored to about 30 global universitiesin the UK, united states, Europe, Australia, India, Malaysia…etc.

Facilities: The universityhas a commitment toward the community life via providing consultations toprivate and governmental agencies, also toward the community health via theuniversity’s teaching clinics and hospital. The university provides differentfinancial resources for students to complete their studies especially for thosewho recognised with a low economic status. The university welcomes allinternational students with affordable fees and living at the universityaccommodations. The accommodations are close to the university campus alongsidetransportation which is cheap and available for 24 hours. Many sport places andlounges are distributed over the university campus so that students and staffcan enjoy their free time. There are lots of health facilities thatinternational students can benefit from while studying at the university. Thevisa regulations for international students are simple and students can applydirectly via the Iraqi consulate at the student home country.

A vision for future: The university has a continuousstrategic plan to improve teaching quality and the university life for studentsand staff members. Due to COVID-19 world crises, the university has a greateffort to increase online teaching to minimize the risk of infection and tomaintain a high teaching level for all students.

name: Mutah University
description: Mutah University (www.mutah.edu.jo) is a public and governmental university that is located in southern Jordan. It was founded in March 22, 1981 to be a national institution for higher education. It contains 2 deanships (Deanship of Scientific Research & Deanship of Students Affairs) and 16 colleges; 8 colleges of Sciences (Agriculture, Engineering, Medicine, Nursing, Science, Pharmacy, ِAllied medical science, & Information Technology; and 8 colleges of Humanities (Arts, Business Administration, Educational Sciences, Islamic Studies, Sport Sciences, Social Sciences, Law, & Graduate Studies). The university has more than 600 faculty members and more than 20000 students. It offers several undergraduate and postgraduate programs in different disciplines for national, regional, and international students. The university has developed and expanded rapidly over the past 37 years. It has become one of the best governmental universities in Jordan, gaining a high reputation at the national and regional levels.

name: Mykolas Romeris University
description:
Mykolas Romeris University (MRU):

● Leading university in social sciences and interdisciplinary research in Lithuania

● Highly recognized especially for the University’s outstanding law department

● International university located in the capital Vilnius, Lithuania

● Modern, creative and entrepreneurial academic community

● Close cooperation with over 300 universities, public and private institutions

● Active participation in academic, professional and inter-sectorial networks

● Full membership of international higher education organizations: International Association of Universities, European University Association, European Association for International Education, European-Asian Knowledge Consortium Social Technologies for Smart and Inclusive Society, etc.

name: Narxoz University
description:
Narxoz Universityis one of the leading
universities in Kazakhstan and Central Asia. It is a non-profit private
university that offers education in three languages (English, Kazakh and
Russian).

The University has five
schools:

The University holds
FIBAA (European) institutional and programme accreditation, as well as ACCA, CIM
and CIMA professional accreditation. Narxoz University entered the QS World
University Rankings and the QS Sustainability rankings for the first time in
2023,building on its ranking as Kazakhstan’s top private university in
Kazakhstan by the Times Higher Education Impact Ranking in 2022. The National
Chamber of Entrepreneurs "Atameken" consistently ranks Narxoz
University programs as among the best in the country.. The University is also a
member of EFMD, PRME, ENAI, Ceeman and the American Chamber of Commerce in
Kazakhstan. Narxoz University is guided by a Business Advisory Council
comprised of top national and international employers in Kazakhstan.

name: National Research Saratov State University
description: Saratov State University founded in 1909, is one of Russia’s oldest classical universities which meets the highest standards. The Saratov State University integrates centuries-old traditions of Russian science, cut-ting-edge information and innovation technologies, applied and fundamental research. Being the largest scientific educational center not only in Saratov but in Volga region in April 2010 the SSU was awarded the status of a National Re-search University within the Russian Government sponsoring program. The University implements main educational programs of all levels, conserves the best practices of Russian higher education in terms of scientific and educational innovational activity, improves the system of continuous education (secondary – higher – post-university education), develops the system of extra-professional education in the frames of “Lifelong Learning” concept.

name: National Technical University  "Kharkiv Polytechnic Institute"
description:
National Technical University “Kharkiv Polytechnic Institute” (NTU
“KhPI”) established in 1885, is a founder of six functioning HEIs, including
National Aerospace University "Kharkiv Aviation Institute", Kharkiv
National Technical University of Radio Electronics, Kharkiv State University of
Engineering and Architecture, National East-Ukrainian University, and Sumy
State University.

Its history
has become an integral part of the scientific, technical, intellectual and
cultural history of Ukraine. The name of a Noble Prize winner L.D. Landau and
the names of worldwide known scientists such as academicians N.N.Beketov,
P.P.Budnikov, A.K.Valter, A.M.Lyapunov, S.P.Tymoshenko, M.D.Pilchykov,
K.D.Sinelnikov, V.A.Steklov, E.I.Orlov, G.F.Proskura, I.I.Strelkov,
V.M.Chrushchov, S.S.Urazovskyi, A.P.Philipov, V.I.Atroshchenko, A.S.Berezhnoi,
A.M.Pidgornyi, the honored doctors D.I.Mendeleev and M.E. Zhukovskyi and also
the name of professor V.L.Kyrpychov, the founder of NTU “KhPI” and Kyiv
Polytechnic, and many other names are connected with the National Technical
University «Kharkiv Polytechnic Institute».

The NTU
"KhPI", accredited at the highest IV level, trains specialists in   76
specialties on a full-time basis.

The University consists of 9 educational-scientific institutes   with 101 Departments  : Institute of Power Engineering, Electronics and
Electromechanics, Institute of Mechanical Engineering and Transport, Institute
of Institute of Computer Modeling, Applied Physics and Mathematics, Institute
of Chemical Technology and Engineering, Institute of Economics, Management and
International Business, Institute of Computer Science and Information
Technology, Institute of social and humanitarian technologies, Institute of
International Education, Medical Institute.

In addition to them, the university includes  
  Military
Institute for Tanks Troops, Kharkiv Computer and Technology College, Poltava
Polytechnic College,  distance learning
center, center for extramural and distance training, interdisciplinary
institute for postgraduate education, scientific and research division, two
research institutes  «Molniya» and
«Ionosphere», scientific and methodical administration, center for advanced
information technologies, Innovation campus.

In 2010 the National Technical University "KhPI"
received the status of self-governing (autonomous) Research National
University. The Decision of the Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine about the
research status includes the directive for the Ministry of Finances to
foreseen, starting from 2011, when drafting the projects of the State Budget of
Ukraine, resources for organization of trainings of researchers and
scientific-and-pedagogical staff, PhD, master and bachelor students of the
University at leading home and foreign research establishments and higher
education institutions,  development of resource-and-technical basis,
creation of scientific-and-training centres, provision of the University with
research equipment and new teaching tools.

name: Niigata University
description:
Founded in 1949, Niigata University is a large-scale Japanese national, comprehensive university located in Niigata City, Japan with a student body of approximately 12,300 students and 3,200 academic and administrative staff members. Our two campuses, one in the downtown area and the other blessed with an abundance of nature provide an ideal environment for students to pursue their academic goals. It’s ten undergraduate faculties and five graduate schools offer students a wide range of academic fields in the Bachelor’s, Master’s and Doctoral degree programs: humanities, education, law, economics, science, medicine, health science, dentistry, engineering and agriculture. The university houses one university hospital providing high-quality, patient-centered medical care and two research institutes: the Brain Research Institute and the Research Institute for Natural Hazards and Disaster Recovery, both of which facilitate and engage in groundbreaking research.

As Niigata University has been dedicating to strive to bring global perspective to all its programs and activities as well as to be an international base for higher education and advanced research, we have promoted collaborative research and education with overseas institutions. Taking advantage of the geographical features of the university, which is located in Niigata City facing the Sea of Japan, the university has been working on building and strengthening international networks in East Asian region while looking out towards the world. Niigata University will endeavor to improve our education and research to ensure that we meet the needs of students and the world.

name: Northern Arizona University
description:
Northern Arizona University is a four-year public research university in Flagstaff, Arizona that offers more than 170 different bachelor’s, master’s, and doctoral programs. Our degree programs are also accessible at more than 20 statewide locations and online. With nationally ranked undergraduate and graduate programs, Northern Arizona University delivers a rigorous, learner-centered education. At Northern Arizona University, you can make a difference. You’ll have opportunities to:

* become a leader on campus and in the community* conduct research in high-quality labs and facilities* gain hands-on experience in your career field* work closely with faculty mentorsWe have an array of student support services that will help you realize your aspirations. Northern Arizona University also offers a four-year, fixed tuition rate to undergraduate students.

name: Northern Borders University
description:
Northern Border University (NBU) is a public university located in the Northern Border Region of Saudi Arabia, home to a large number of archaeological and historical sites dating back to pre-Islamic times. The Northern Border Region lies in the farthest north of the Kingdom, bordering both Iraq and Jordan, which is one of the important passages of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia in the northern part.  The region is characterized by plenty of pasturelands and became an economic pillar of the country after the discovery of different minerals like phosphates in large amounts in Turaif and Hazam al-Jalamid. The discovery has contributed to the launching of King Abdullah's project of upgrading Wa'd ash-Shamal City for Mineral Industries which will become a major development tributary. Thus, the Northern Border Region will, therefore, have its share of development and prosperity.

NBU was founded by the Custodian of the Two Holy Mosques, King Abdullah bin Abdulaziz, during his historic visit to the Northern Border Region in 2007 which is added to the Higher Education System as number 20 in the Kingdom. The university is one of the distinguished and promising universities which has taken giant strides toward upgrading the educational process in a very short time of its life. The university has four campuses spread across the Northern Border Region of Saudi Arabia. Its main campus is located in Arar, the capital city of the Northern Border Region; whereas its branches are located in Rafha, Turaif, and Al-Uwayqilah. The teaching of university is split across sixteen (16) faculties, nine (9) of which are in Arar (Education and Arts, Business Administration, Science, Engineering, Medicine, Applied Medical Science, Home Economics, Nursing and Community), four (4) faculties in Rafha (Computing and Information Technology, Pharmacy, Science and Arts, Community), two (2) in Turaif (Science and Arts, Community) , and one (1) in Al-Uwayqilah (Science and Arts).  Currently, the university offers over 47 academic programs of study.  The university has contributed to the progress of education, society, and economy in the region. It is considered as an essential artery that provides the labor market with a qualified and well-prepared workforce according to the requirements of the development plan in developing and building the region.

name: Notre Dame University-Louaize NDU
description:
About NDU

Notre Dame
University-Louaize (NDU) is a private Catholic university in Lebanon, founded
in 1987, and deeply rooted in the Maronite tradition that goes back to 1736, when the founding Order of the Blessed Virgin Mary decided to offer free education to everyone, especially girls. Renowned for its high-quality liberal arts education, NDU has its main campus in Zouk Mosbeh, 15 km
north of Beirut, and two regional campuses in Deir El Qamar and Barsa,
expanding its academic reach across Lebanon. Accredited by the New England
Commission of Higher Education (NECHE), NDU upholds global educational
standards.

The university
prioritizes academic excellence, social responsibility, and ethical leadership.
This approach attracts a diverse student body from Lebanon and abroad, all
committed to transforming lives through education.

Programmatic
Accreditation

NDU's academic excellence is supported by its prestigious programmatic
accreditations, including the following:

Facilities

NDU offers state-of-the-art facilities across all its campuses. The Main campus
features modern laboratories, research centers, and libraries, while the NLC
and Shouf campuses provide essential resources tailored to the specific
disciplines offered at each location. Additionally, NDU supports student
well-being with sports facilities and wellness centers. The University is also
committed to sustainability, implementing green initiatives across its
campuses​.

​Student Life

Student life at NDU is dynamic and multifaceted, with a wide range of
extracurricular activities that cater to different interests and talents. NDU
offers a variety of student clubs and organizations, as well as opportunities
for involvement in sports, arts, and social service projects. Students can
participate in academic societies, leadership programs, and cultural events
that enrich their university experience and foster personal development.

Spiritual life is also
an essential component of student life at NDU. The university offers religious services,
retreats, and spiritual development programs through its Campus Ministry.

Cultural engagement is
another key aspect of life at NDU, with numerous events such as art
exhibitions, theater performances, and music festivals held throughout the
academic year. These activities encourage students to explore their creative
sides, broaden their cultural horizons, and build a vibrant campus community​.

Admissions

NDU offers a broad spectrum of undergraduate and graduate programs in
disciplines ranging from the arts and sciences to business and engineering. The
admissions process is designed to be transparent and accessible, with detailed
guidance available through the university’s website and campus visits.
Prospective students are encouraged to apply online, where they can find
information about program requirements, deadlines, and necessary documentation.

To support students
financially, NDU provides various scholarships and tuition assistance programs.
These opportunities are intended to make NDU’s high-quality education
accessible to a broader range of students, helping them achieve their academic
and professional goals without financial constraints​.

Careers

NDU’s Career Center plays a pivotal role in preparing students for their
professional lives. Through personalized career counseling, internship
programs, and skills development workshops, the university helps students build
the competencies needed for success in their chosen careers. The center also
offers internships and job placement services, working closely with companies
and organizations in Lebanon and abroad to ensure that NDU graduates have
access to valuable opportunities.

The university’s alumni
network is a key resource for current students, offering mentorship and
professional connections. By maintaining strong ties with the industry, NDU
ensures that its academic programs align with real-world needs, enabling
students to seamlessly transition from education to employment​.

For more information about NDU's programs, facilities, and admissions, please visit NDU's website atwww.ndu.edu.lb.

name: Ohio University
description: Ohio University doesn’t simply deliver a degree. It offers an experience that will become part of who you are and what you’ll be, forever. Your OHIO experiences will teach you everything you truly need to know—how to learn and lead, how to forge a fulfilling career path that can withstand unexpected turns, how to make an impact on people and communities, and much, much more. Discover your place at this top-100 public university (U.S. News & World Report), which is also ranked a best-value university (U.S. News, Forbes)—on one of the most beautiful campuses in the nation (Expedia).

name: Pavol Jozef Šafárik University in Košice
description:
Pavol Josef Safarik University was established in 1959 in the city of Košice in eastern Slovakia. Second in size only to Bratislava, Košice was the European Capital of Culture in 2013 and is home to many museums, galleries and theatres. The university is home to more then 7000 students and is divided into five faculties:

Named after the 19th century philologist, poet and historian Pavel Jozef Šafárik, the university also has a botanical garden, ICT center, Institute of Physical Education and Sport, as well as an extensive university library.

name: Pontificia Universidad Católica del Ecuador (PUCE)
description: The Pontificia Universidad Católica del Ecuador (PUCE) is a Pontifical Catholic university founded in 1946 in Quito, Ecuador.The principal campus of the University is in Quito. Other campuses are in Ambato, Esmeraldas, Ibarra, Santo Domingo de los Colorados, and a regional campus in the province of Manabí. The campus in Cuenca later became the Universidad del Azuay. All branches follow the National System PUCE.

name: Pontifícia Universidade Católica de São Paulo
description:
Pontifícia Universidade Católica de São Paulo, locally known as PUC or the Catholic University (Universidade Católica), is a private and non-profit Catholic university. It is one of the largest and most prestigious Brazilian universities. It is maintained by the Catholic Archdiocese of São Paulo.

Most of the scientific production in PUC-SP can be found in the areas of Law, Philosophy, Social Sciences, Economics, Education, Social Service and Communication, and, in these areas, it is considered one of the most important universities in Latin America, and internationally recognized by the issues and research in disorders of human communication, political economics, semiotics and psychology.

The main campus of PUC-SP and its administrative headquarters are located in Perdizes in the west side of São Paulo City. The School of Exact Sciences and Technology is located near the city centre (Consolação Campus) while Business and Economy courses are also offered in the north side of São Paulo City (Santana Campus). The School of Medical Sciences and Health is located in the city of Sorocaba (90 km from São Paulo) and a campus in the city of Barueri offers courses of Business, Economics, Physical Therapy and Psychology.

name: Poznan University of Life Sciences
description:
Based in Poznan, Poland - the country’s fifth-largest city - the Poznan University of Life Sciences offers higher-education teaching in the life sciences subject area. Studying here means living in one of the most important business centers in Poland, among a population of over 500,000 people.

The Poznan University of Life Sciences is one of several state-owned universities in the city, with a total student population of around 140,000. This means approximately one in four residents is a student.

Established in 1951, the Poznan University of Life Sciences was established by combining the agriculture and forestry faculties at the city’s Adam Mickiewicz University and making them into a new institution. Today, the university offers teaching in a range of subjects including: agronomy, forestry, horticulture, land reclamation and environmental engineering.

name: Poznan University of Technology
description:
Poznan University of Technology (PUT) is an important higher education institution in Greater Poland region (Wielkopolska). Created in 1919, with more than 100 years of history, PUT is an excellent example of tradition combined with modern approach to education and  research. Currently, Poznan University of Technology is a nine-faculty institution of higher education:

The university offers courses at the undergraduate and postgraduate level. In 1995, Poznan

University of Technology became a member of the Conference of European Schools for Advanced Engineering Education and Research (CESAEER). From  2020, Poznan University of Technology is the leader of European University EUNICE – European Commission project. The main goal of EUNICE (European University for Customized Education) is to build a common European University of the future, aspiring to generate a shift from traditional to customized education through inter-university mobility and to provide a high-quality digital learning with strong cooperation with industry, offering flexible multidisciplinary studies and exchange opportunities for students and staff.

name: Rhodes University
description: Located in Grahamstown in the Eastern Cape province of South Africa, Rhodes is a small university which enjoys the distinction of having among the best undergraduate pass and graduation rates in South Africa, outstanding postgraduate success rates, and the best research output per academic staff member. This is testimony to the quality of students that Rhodes attracts and of academic provision, and to the commitment of Rhodes staff to student development and success. our more than 7 000 students, 26% are postgraduates and 20% are international students from 40 countries around the world, making Rhodes a dynamic and cosmopolitan knowledge institution. Students are able to undertake an extensive range of undergraduate and postgraduate degrees in the faculties of Humanities, Science, Commerce, Pharmacy, Law and Education. With the most favourable academic staff to student ratio among South African universities, Rhodes students are guaranteed easy access to academics and close supervision. The University takes pride in its motto, Where Leaders Learn, and producing graduates who are knowledgeable intellectuals, skilled professionals, and critical, caring and compassionate citizens who can contribute to economic and social development and an equitable, just and democratic society.

name: Riga Stradins University
description:
Academic Excellence with Real-World Impact

Riga Stradins University (RSU) in Latvia is a leading centre of excellence in medicine and social sciences, recognised for its strong focus on practical, high-impact education and research. As one of the most advanced higher education institutions in the Baltic region, RSU prepares highly skilled professionals who contribute to healthcare, social development, and policymaking both in Latvia and globally. Its academic staff consists of respected experts who are thought leaders in their fields and society.

A Truly Global Study Environment

RSU offers a comprehensive three-cycle education system, including bachelor’s, master’s, higher professional, doctoral, and residency programmes. RSU diplomas are recognised across the European Union and European Economic Area, opening doors to exciting career opportunities worldwide.

For over 30 years, RSU has been a top choice for international students. Over a third of the university’s student body comes from a broad and represents more than 70 countries. This global reach places RSU among the top 150 universities worldwide for international student ratio, reflected in a diverse and dynamic academic environment that fosters cross-cultural exchange and collaboration.

name: Ritsumeikan Asia Pacific University
description:
Ritsumeikan Asia Pacific University or APU, is a private institution inaugurated April 2000 in Beppu, Ōita, Japan. APU was made possible through the collaboration of three parties from the public and private sectors: Ōita Prefecture - Beppu City and the Ritsumeikan Academy.

There are two four-month semesters in one academic year. One semester is divided into two quarters lasting for seven weeks. Most of the classes in APU are carried out on a quarter system. Unlike many other universities, students are accepted for enrollment and graduate twice a year, in spring and fall.

name: SRM Institute of Science and Technology
description:
SRM Institute of Science and Technology(formerly known as SRM University) - where you have the freedom to take wings.

SRM Institute of Science and Technology  is one of the top-ranking universities in India with over 52,000 full-time students and more than 3200 faculty across all the campuses - Kattankulathur, Ramapuram, Ramapuram Part – all in and around Chennai,   and Modinagar, NCR, Delhi and Tiruchirappalli - offering a wide range of undergraduate, postgraduate and doctoral programs in six Faculties – Engineering & Technology, Management, Medicine & Health Sciences, Science & Humanities, Law and Agricultural Sciences.

Foreign faculty, flexible and dynamic curriculum, exciting research and global connections are the features that set SRM apart. Students have a wide choice of cutting-edge programs including nanotechnology, genetic engineering, remote sensing and GIS, embedded systems or computer forensics to choose from. Most of these courses are offered in close collaboration with foreign universities. Even at UG level specialized engineering programs like Artificial Intelligence, Big Data Analytics, IoT etc. are offered. All the programs offered are approved by UGC and applicable Statutory Councils like AICTE etc.

SRMIST is accredited with the highest grade of A++ by the autonomous Governmental body National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC).

It is categorized as Category I University by Ministry Of Education, Government of India.

For the last six years, SRMIST is ranked within the top 50 universities out of around 1000, in India by Ministry of Education’s National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF).

SRMIST is ranked by QS under its various categories as well as rated with QS-4 Stars and QS-IGUAGE Diamond rating.

SRMIST is ranked 5 th in India under Nature Index – Ranking -2020.

SRMIST is ranked No. 2 among privately funded institutes in India under Atal Ranking of Institutions on Innovation Achievements (ARIIA) -2020 by Ministry of Education.

Five undergraduate programs of Engineering and Technology offered at Kattankulathur campus are accredited by commissions of ABET, USA. (www.abet.org)

Four other undergraduate programs of Engineering and Technology offered at Kattankulathur campus are accredited by Institution of Engineering and Technology, UK.

name: Saint-Petersburg Mining University
description: Founded by the decree of Empress Catherine II in 1773, Saint-Petersburg Mining University is the first technical higher educational institution in Russia.Today the university boasts a unique combination of the richest tradition and modern state-of-the-art technologies and facilities across its eight schools, including:Geological ProspectingOil and Gas EngineeringMining EngineeringCivil EngineeringPower and Mechanical EngineeringMineral Raw Material ProcessingEconomicsHumanities and SciencesIts well-developed infrastructure and high competence of academic staff provide over 12,000 students with the best education through its wide range of bachelor’s, master’s and specialist’s profiles for future employees of Russian and international companies engaged in estimation, prospecting, exploitation, exploration and processing of raw materials, oil, gas, diamonds, and ores.Saint-Petersburg Mining University is also the initiator of a number of international projects, such as the Russian-UK Raw Materials Dialogue, as well as the Russian-German Raw Materials Forum. The Russian-German Raw Materials Forum was established under the auspices, along with the direct participation of Russian President, Vladimir Putin, and German Chancellor, Angela Merkel.

name: Samarkand State University
description:
Samarkand State University plays great role in recognizing as a centre of science and culture for all over the world. Nowadays SamSU is one of the oldest and largest higher educational establishments, though it was officially inaugurated as the University beginning of the 20th century but it's roots go back down to the Ulughbek's period. Samarkand State University begins from Ulughbek's period (15th century).In 30th the University was turned into Uzbek Pedagogical Academy named after Akmal Ikromov and since 1933 it had been called the Uzbek State University. In 1941 when the 500th anniversary of the famous uzbck poet and thinker Alisher Navoi was celebrated the university was titled after his name. Well-known national enlighteners Abdurauf Fitrat, Gazi Olim Yusupov, Saidrasul Azizi joined M. Abdukasimov. V.Abdullaev, I. Muminov, M. Sobirov, U. Tursunov, R. Iskandarov, A. Yakubov, J. Kabulov and others were educated at this institution.

Our educational Institution during it's activity prepared more than 100 thousand highly qualified specialists: Ibragim Muminov, Sulton Umarov, Akbar Adkhamov, Ubay Oripov, Yakhya Gulomov, Alauddin Bagaddinov, Vokhid Abdullaev, Toshpolat Shirinkulov, Botirkhon Valikhodjaev, Mukhsin Ashurov, Said Shermukhammedov, Shavkat Vokhidov and famous writers and poets as Hamid Olimjon, Usmon Nosir, Sharof Rashidov, Askar Mukhtor, Borot Boykobilov. Dushan Fayziy and many others. Many famous writers, poets, scientist, statesmen and political figures graduated from this University.

During these years some faculties were separated from this University and became independent higher educational Institutions, such as, Samarkand Institute of agriculture, medical, cooperative, pedagogical institute and Institute of foreign languages. Today's development of our High Education Institution and its history is connected with the names of N. Merkulovich, K. Abdullaev. A. Valieva, Kh. Fayzullaev, M. Muminov, R. Olimjonov, K. Zakirov, A. Tolaganov, E. Turakulov, A. Atakhodjaev, Sh. Alimov, M. JurakuIov, T. Muminov, J. Sattarov, T. Shirinov, A. Khalmukhamedov, R. Khalmuradov, who were the Rectors of Samarkand State

There are fourtheen faculties, which train professional specialists, improve their professional skills. There is also an Academic Lyceum and other institutions and scientific research laboratories, modem computer classrooms and museums. For the last ten years the students of our University are regularly taking part in the Republic and world sports competitions. University students became world champions and there are about ten prize winners, participants of international Olympic Games, more than 10 champions of Asian Games, more than 80 champions of Uzbekistan, champions of the Student's Games. There are more than 13 thousand students, who study at the bachelor and master's degree courses.

The training languages are Engilish, German, French, Spain, Russian, Tajik and Uzbek. More than 800 professors form the academic staff of the University. The are more than 13000 students taught at Bachelor's (more than 301 and Master's 44 programs at the University.

More information in the link http://samdu.uz/en

http://samdu.uz/en/talaba-xorijiy-videorolik/2

name: San Diego State University
description: San Diego State University is the oldest and largest higher education institution in the San Diego region. Now in its 117th year, San Diego State University can take pride in more than a century of achievement in education, research and service. With an enrollment of more than 35,000 students, SDSU is increasingly becoming a top choice for undergraduates as evidenced by the record number of applications received each year.

name: Seoul National University of Science and Technology
Sheffield Hallam University
description:
University of the Year for Teaching Quality 2020*,  we offer almost 400 courses which all focus on developing the specialist knowledge you need to excel in your chosen career.

We work with thousands of organisations, from HSBC to the NHS, and these industry partners help design our courses and give you the experience and contacts you need to make your CV stand out to future employers. Many of our courses are accredited by professional associations and bodies.

Our students benefit from access to our world-class facilities. We’re constantly updating and adding to the facilities you’ll use, with £100 million invested in new buildings since 2014. This means 24-hour libraries, student-designed study areas, excellent sports facilities and the same equipment you’ll find in your future workplace, whether it’s an aeroplane manufacturer, a software engineering company or a hospital.

65% of our research is rated internationally excellent or world leading, putting us in the top 5 modern universities. Read more about the REF case studies which helped us to earn this prestigious rating.

Sheffield is a welcoming, multicultural city with a rich and proud history. It is a safe, friendly and affordable place to live, which is why it is the study destination of choice for more than 60,000 students. The city also offers the best of both worlds, with all the amenities, culture and entertainment of a big city and the peaceful, green spaces of the countryside.

Tuition fees vary depending on the course you choose , you can find on our online prospectus we offer scholarships and other financial packages for international and EU students. If you have completed an undergraduate degree with us, you could qualify for an alumni scholarship towards your fees.

We hold regular postgraduate open days and virtual events. These provide you with the opportunity to discuss your postgraduate options with course specialists and our support staff, either in person, or online. Prospective students can now speak one-on-one with student ambassadors and get impartial advice about student life, accommodation, courses and get a real feel for what it’s like to study at Sheffield Hallam. Start a chat with a current Sheffield Hallam student.

We are happy to support you throughout the application process. If you have any questions about applying for any of our postgraduate courses, contact Direct Admissions on +44 (0) 114 225 5555 or[email protected]. If you are an international student requiring advice and guidance you can contact our offices in the UK, China, India, Malaysia, Nigeria and Pakistan or contact one of our registered recruitment agents.

*The Times and Sunday Times University Guide 2020.

name: Siberian Federal University, SibFU
description:
Established in 2006 Siberian Federal University (SibFU) is one of the Russian 20 top universities with 21 schools that provide a wide range of academic programs in natural sciences, humanities and engineering.Home to over 26,000 students, including more than 1,000 international students from 47 countries, SibFU fosters a supportive and multicultural atmosphere within a vibrant research environment.The University key research areas support SibFU’s mission to provide comprehensive support for sustainable environmental  management in unique territories rich in renewable resources:·      Sustainable environmental management·      Biology and biotechnology·      Physics and chemistry of new materials·      Radio technology and navigation·      IT and digitalization·      Mining and geotechnology·      New electronics96 undergraduate and 187 postgraduate programs (programs in English included) in natural sciences, engineering, social sciences and  humanities are regularly reviewed by the industry, business and government to ensure graduates are prepared for today’s changing global market.  The  employability of our graduates is ranked as one of the best in Russia.As the tuition at the undergraduate level is in the  Russian language only, we provide the preparatory course of Russian as a  foreign language, and afterwards a student can apply for a degree program (http://welcome.sfu-kras.ru/#eduprogramms).We also hold international summer schools and provide  short-term academic programs. The information is available on the site (http://www.sfu-kras.ru/en/education/courses). The Summer School programs have been already held online this year due to the spread of Covid-19. Further details of our 2021 program will be available in  autumn.You can continue your research career in our PhD  programs in Russian or in English (sfu-kras.ru/en/PhD#programs).Students will be surprised with tuition fees from 1700 USD up to 4000 USD per year depending on the academic program in combination  with very affordable and comfortable housing on campus. Residential life system of 30 fully equipped modern residence halls and not high rent payment. SibFU is  consistently ranked in the top 20 Russian universities with the best campus in the country.About 90 percent of undergraduate students live on campus and enjoy wonderful outdoor and indoor sports facilities (the heritage of the 29 Winter Students’ Games) and over 100 students’ clubs as life of a SibFU student is not all about studying.For more details about the application procedure, please, refer to the link (http://welcome.sfu-kras.ru/#howtoapply) ...

Further details of our 2021 program will be available in  autumn.You can continue your research career in our PhD  programs in Russian or in English (sfu-kras.ru/en/PhD#programs).Students will be surprised with tuition fees from 1700 USD up to 4000 USD per year depending on the academic program in combination  with very affordable and comfortable housing on campus. Residential life system of 30 fully equipped modern residence halls and not high rent payment. SibFU is  consistently ranked in the top 20 Russian universities with the best campus in the country.About 90 percent of undergraduate students live on campus and enjoy wonderful outdoor and indoor sports facilities (the heritage of the 29 Winter Students’ Games) and over 100 students’ clubs as life of a SibFU student is not all about studying.For more details about the application procedure, please, refer to the link (http://welcome.sfu-kras.ru/#howtoapply) ...

name: Silesian University of Technology
description:
The Silesian University of Technology (SUT) is a place that, without any doubts, educates successful people. It is a modern higher education institution with 75 years of tradition in teaching, research and science. It was established in 1945 as a scientific and educational facility for Upper Silesia, the most industrialized area in Poland, and one of the most industrialized in Europe.

The SUT consists of fifteen faculties – eleven in Gliwice, two in Zabrze and two in Katowice. The main seat of the SUT is in Gliwice, a charming, 800 years old city and important scientific, research and design centre in Poland. Gliwice has nearly 200,000 inhabitants and thanks to the SUT it is the second (next to Warsaw) agglomeration of technical intelligence. During the last 20 years, Gliwice has transformed from a city based on heavy industry into a leader in the new technologies.

The University also established close cooperation with its business environment. In the entire Upper Silesia, there are numerous companies and special economic zones, including the Katowice Special Economic Zone, with numerous enterprises operating in the fields of advanced technologies. The SUT does it in order to reach its main objective, which is to train highly skilled engineering staff for the modern industry and to conduct and implement innovative research. The University also pays special attention to the development of entrepreneurship among its students.

The SUT is home to a vibrant community of almost 1,700 of the best and brightest minds. We attract academics whose passion and brilliance drives them to become leaders in their field. The university offers studies on bachelor, master and doctoral level. Studies are conducted in a full-time and a part-time system. The majority of bachelor programmes are 3.5 years long (7 semesters) and master programmes are 1.5 years long (3 semesters) with the possibility of an extension. Studies at the SUT give ample opportunities to broaden your interests. During the academic year, the university is vibrant with activities inspired by the Student Council and various student organizations, over 100 scientific associations and 20 different sports sections, such as basketball, volleyball, cycling, handball, skiing, aerobics etc.

The SUT is also a key player in new technologies. It is here, where new ideas are brought to life, and once applied by the industry they boost the competitiveness of Polish and international companies. The University received two ELSEVIER Research Impact Leaders Awards. In 2016 in the Engineering and Technology category and in 2018 in the Social Sciences category as one of the higher education institutions whose publications had the greatest impact on the perception of Polish science in the world. The Silesian University of Technology also ranked 4th  in the recent Perspektywy Foundation Ranking of Engineering Studies 2018 and 9th among all Polish universities.

name: Slovak University of Technology in Bratislava
description:
Slovak University of Technology in Bratislava is a modern educational and scientific institution. Since its foundation in the year 1937 more than 155.000 students have graduated there. In average, 14.500 students study at the STU every year. Its graduates have high employment prospects, and in recent years have boasted the lowest record of postgraduate unemployment in the country.

STU is Slovakia’s largest technical university. Its activities reach back to the rich old tradition of the Mining Academy in Banská Štiavnica, established by the Empress Maria Theresia in 1762.

At present, STU consists of seven faculties that provide research in a number of research departments and several centres of excellence following a long-term strategy when the priority areas are biotechnology and biocompatibility; sustainable resources and development: energy and raw materials; sustainable resources and development: environment, landscape and urbanism; nanotechnology, nanosciences and multifunctional intelligent materials; information society technology; life, health and environment; safety, reliability and quality.

All the STU faculties provide a study in accredited study programmes within the complex system of bachelor, master and PhD study. Faculties realise a credit system compatible with the European credit transfer system enabling mutual mobility of students within European Union member countries and a larger European space.

name: Soonchunhyang University
description:
The name "Soonchunhyang" means "the peaceful hometown complying with the will of heaven." In 1978 Dr. Succ-jo Suh, a renowned authority in neurology established Soonchunhyang Medical College with fewer than one hundred students to educate aspiring doctors.His philosophy of medical practice was, “It is not a doctor, but Heaven that cures a disease. A doctor helps only the curing process.” With this humble philosophy and beginnings, SCH set off and transformed itself to a highly respected institution of higher education and research.The University currently has six colleges and six graduate schools with over 12,000 students enrolled and approximately 380 faculty members. In addition, the university is running four general hospitals in four major cities in Korea creating an up-to-date medical network.The University offers a rich variety of courses in Medicine and Natural Sciences, as well as all professional field including Humanities, Business Administration and Engineering.SCH has particularly strong medicine and medical sciences departments and has constantly strived to excel in both education and research. SCH’s reputation for quality education has been continually proved when the Ministry of Education has granted the "National Award for Educational Renovation" for three successive years.

2020.Selected for the Global Korea Scholarship (GKS-KGSP) designated university by the National Institute for International Education, Ministry of Education

name: Southern Federal University
description:
Southern Federal University is one of the largest scientific and educational centers in Russia. It traces its history back to 1915. SFedU nowadays combines the traditions of a classical university with innovative infrastructure, implements educational programs and develops fundamental and applied research in the field of engineering, materials science, and information technology, interdisciplinary social and humanitarian research.Today, about 24,000 students are studying in two campuses located in Rostov-on-Don and Taganrog. Research and training in engineering is conducted on the Taganrog campus, and the Rostov campus offers a wide range of courses in the natural sciences and humanities. SFedU offers 81 undergraduate programs, 20 specialist degree programs, 199 master's programs, and 26 doctoral programs. The quality of academic programs is confirmed by the state accreditation agency of the Russian Federation, some programs also have quality confirmation from external accreditation agencies, including ACQUIN and AQAS, etc. (Fundamental computer science and information technology (bachelor's, master's), Applied mathematics and computer science (bachelor's, master's), Psychology (bachelor's, master's), Psychological support for education of persons with developmental problems (master's), etc.)The percentage of foreign students, 25 Erasmus partner institutions, 50 exchange agreements and 10 double-degree programs evidence the fact that the internationalization of the educational activities of the university is actively developing. Annually more than 2,500 foreign students from 78 countries study at SFedU at undergraduate, graduate and postgraduate levels. Foreign students have the opportunity to sign up for the preparatory year to study the Russian language.SFedU is actively involved in the Bologna process, and its graduates receive the European Diploma Supplement. SFedU conducts a world-class research in the field of information technology, intelligent materials, nanotechnology, future medicine and robotics. Students can conduct research and make prototypes in the international laboratories of SFedU, centers for the collective use of scientific equipment and engineering centers. Free access to collaboration spaces, sports grounds, the university’s swimming pool, and the opportunity to participate in a wide range of sports events allows you to spend your free time productively on the university’s campus.In general, international students’ adjustment to a new lifestyle and educational system may be quite challenging. In order to create a positive learning environment and decrease anxiety, Southern Federal University provides international students with a variety of campus resources at their disposal. There are several units at SFedU responsible for development and promotion of student support services, such as SFedU Students’ Union, International Student Club, and Students’ Creativity Club, that offer an enormous range of cultural, community, leisure, and sport activities to take advantage of on campus.The interaction between students while taking part in creative events and festivals such as “The Spring Creative Festival”, “The Golden Voice of SFedU”, “The Freshman Cup”, “Studio Student Theatre Festival” and “The Creative Marathon” reveals students’ artistic potential and sets the stage for a cross-cultural exchange of ideas and traditions.While increasing students’ participation in intercultural events such as “International Kitchen”, “Mother Language Day”, “The Friendship of Nations Concert”, “International Movie Club”, and other intercultural on-campus activities, SFedU establishes a reliable environment for enhancing cultural awareness, sharing of cultural experiences, and overcoming language barriers.International students of SFedU are welcome to join a broad range of sport clubs. National teams from Colombia, Ecuador and Turkmenistan in different sports as well as various sections of mini-football and volleyball are among them. Members of SFedU sports clubs regularly take part in local and national competitions, which helps them to develop team spirit and a passion for leadership....

name: Southern Methodist University
description:
SMU is celebrating the centennial of its founding in 1911 and its opening in 1915. As SMU enters a second century of achievement, it is recognized as a university of increasing national prominence.SMU prepares students for leadership in their professions and in their communities. The University’s location near the heart of Dallas – a thriving center of commerce and culture – offers students enriching experiences on campus and beyond. Relationships in the Dallas area provide a platform for launching careers throughout the world.The University offers a strong foundation in the humanities and sciences and undergraduate, graduate and professional degree programs through seven schools. The learning environment includes opportunities for research, community service, internships, mentoring and study abroad.

SMU was founded by what is now The United Methodist Church, in partnership with civic leaders, and was shaped by the entrepreneurial spirit of the region. The University is nonsectarian in its teaching and committed to academic freedom and open inquiry.

name: Southwest University
description: Southwest University (SWU) is a key comprehensive “211 project university and “985 Project (a constructive project for founding world-class universities in the 21st century conducted by the central government) Innovation Platform” Project university sponsored by China’s Ministry of Education. Located in Chongqing, one of the most competitive metropolises in the world, with a total area of over 600 hectares, SWU is well-known nationwide for her “Garden Campus”. There are a variety of students numbering over 100000, of whom 50000 are full-time undergraduates and postgraduates. SWU covers a wide range of majors including philosophy, economics, law, pedagogy, literature, history, science, engineering, agronomy, medicine, arts and management. Majors in pedagogy, psychology and agriculture enjoy distinguished predominance in China. There are over 2800 full time teachers including 1800 professors and full-time researchers. The qualified international students at SWU are privileged to get “Chinese Government Scholarship”, “Confucius Institute Scholarship”, “Chongqing Mayor Scholarship”, “SWU President Scholarship” , “SWU Excellent International students’ Scholarship” and “SWU International College Scholarship”. There are many international students from above 60 countries or regions studying at SWU every year. SWU is an ideal place for study in China.

name: Sumgayit State University
description:
Sumgait State University, founded in 1962, is already one of the prestigious higher education institutions of Azerbaijan.  University is taking successful steps by benefiting from advanced international experience, the successes of the national education system, and 60 years of rich traditions. In addition to being a scientific and educational institution, SSU is also successfully developing its activities in all areas as the intellectual and cultural center of the city. New teaching and scientific-research laboratories created in accordance with the requirements of the modern era, several structural changes, newly installed “smart boards” in the auditoriums, year-by-year expansion of international relations and other implemented projects all reflect the rich image of the university full of innovations.   At the moment, Sumgait State University has 7 faculties (Mathematics, Physics and Electroenergetics, Engineering, Chemistry and Biology, History and Geography, Economics and management, Philology), 29 departments, 6 scientific research laboratories, Teaching Methodological Center, Doctorate and Master’s department, Scientific department, Department of foreign students and other institutions. Specialist training for philosophy and doctor of science programs is conducted at the university.

Sumgait State University is closest to the capital and in the very center of industry, and at the same time, it prepares specialists in both humanitarian and applied specialties and is the only higher education institution in the region.

The university has partnerships with many prestigious universities of the world. The scientists of the university cooperate with the world’s major universities and research centers. One of the main goals of Sumgait State University is to become a university that meets international standards, has innovative, high rated, highly qualified personnel, to enter the world ranking lists and to have the status of an international university. At the same time, expansion of relations with leading foreign educational institutions, implementation of international double diploma programs are among the main goals.  Ensuring the training university graduates as highly qualified personnel, strengthening the position and raising the prestige of the university in the field of educational activities at the national and international levels, realizing the creative potential of scientists, postgraduate and undergraduate students, expanding their scientific relations and creating conditions for publishing the results of scientific research are also among the main priorities of the university. 3 specialties of the University have received the
certificate of accreditation of European independent accreditation company - ASIIN
(head office is in Germany) since 2016.     For
undergraduate level these specialties are:

-         
    Process
automation;

-         
    Electrical
Power engineering;

For Master’s level:

-         
    Energy
management.

Since
2016, admission on the program of doctor of sciences     has
been carried out at the University.

In
2018, FD.02.193-Dissertation Council was instituted on specialties of “3303.01-Chemical
technology and engineering” and “3337.01-Information measurement and management
systems (on fields)”.

By the decision of
the Cabinet of Ministers of the Republic of Azerbaijan №30 dated 03.02.2016 and
the order of the Ministry of Education № 130 dated 04.03.2016, Sumgayit State
Technical College was affiliated to the University.

name: Sumy State University
description:
Sumy State University (SumDU) is a fully comprehensive Ukrainian
university with about 50% of private funding sources, high international
orientation, and a focus on research. The University holds high positions among
Ukrainian higher education institutions for the number of prize-winning places
in All-Ukrainian competitions of students’ research works and All-Ukrainian
Olympiads in educational disciplines, training areas and majors. The University
is a signatory of Magna Charta Universitatum and Talloires Declaration, a reliable
member of the International Association of Universities, European University Association,
Association of Economic Universities of South and Eastern Europe and the Black
Sea Region, Baltic University Programme, IREG Observatory on Academic Ranking
and Excellence and other international organizations.

Sumy State University cooperates with more than 300 partners from 55
world countries, including the USA, Great Britain, Germany, Austria, France,
Belgium, Sweden, Poland, Lithuania, Bulgaria, the Czech Republic, Slovakia,
Romania, Japan, South Korea, China and other countries of the world. The
University actively develops academic mobility programmes, including long-term
and short-term studies, internships, virtual mobility programmes and placement
programmes for undergraduate and postgraduate students; professional development,
teaching, and research mobility for staff with substantial scholarship and
grant support using technologies of credit transfer and recognition of academic
results. According to the number of commercial contracts and grants, and the
efficiency of using budget funds, Sumy State University is one of the leaders among
Ukrainian universities. 40 kinds of sports and about 100 sports groups are
available at the University.

Sports teams perform at the premier league level. About 100 students
are the record breakers and prize winners of the Olympic Games, World, European
and Ukrainian Championships.

The mission of SumDU is to maximize of satisfaction of value
expectations of all the categories of the university stakeholders through
ensuring an undeniable competitive advantage of services being provided, their
adaptivity to the modern world needs which are changing rapidly, and
excellence. This, in particular, has to be displayed in: - delivering
educational activity at the level that provides preparation of highly educated intellectual
elite of the society and implements the thesis “The university is the talents
industry”; - ensuring of high requirements of the labour market by the
specialists of new formation who are able to work under conditions of
rapid-changing, multifunctional environment; - delivering of educational needs
of the general population through accessibility to obtaining knowledge and
skills, diversity of form of implementation of continuous lifelong learning
that is one of the components of the university’s social mission; - generation
of new knowledge through the large-scale, multidisciplinary scientific
activity; - influence on the socio-economic development of the society through
the transfer of the innovative technologies, implementation of the mission of
the centre of communication among business, science, education, government; -
preparation of scientific and scientific-pedagogical staff with competencies
well accepted in the global scientific and educational space; - ensuring the
export of educational and scientific services to other countries, in particular
to countries of the Organization of Economic Co-operation and Development
(OECD) or/and the EU; - simultaneous implementation of corresponding functions
of innovative development at the regional, national and global levels; -
influence on the society’s mental life, caring attitude to culture,
preservation of mental and material values, forming of an integral, moral,
nationally conscious human being; - implementation of multifaceted social
mission, the function of civil society institution.

name: Sungshin Women's University
description:
Contributing to country and community by fostering sincere and faithful female leaders on the basis of national spirit

Be sincere and faithful, Strive for new knowledge, Act independently

The school name of Sungshin ('誠信') was generated at the time when school foundation was established and its etymological origin lies in the phrase of "身致其誠信" from Liji((Rites Records). Founder, Woonjung, Dr. Lee Suk-jong thought that if there is faith outside and sincere inside, one can achieve anything. Therefore, she adopted Sungshin not only as the school name but also as the educational philosophy. Furthermore, she believed that by integrating sincerity and faithfulness organically with new knowledge and acting independently, students could reform them as a female professionals equipped with wisdom, ability, and perfect personality.

For more information   on SSWU, please visit https://www.sungshin.ac.kr/main_eng/index.do

name: Széchenyi István University (University of Győr)
description:
With 14,000 students and employing more
than 1,200 teaching, research and administrative staff, Széchenyi István
University (SZE) is located in North-West Hungary, in the county seat of Győr.
This historic city, with a population of 131,000 and an agglomeration of
approximately 300,000, is strategically located within Central Europe’sgolden
triangle, alongside Vienna and Bratislava, capital of Slovakia. As
Hungary’s sixth-largest city, Győr boasts a vibrant industrial sector that
contributes an impressive 10% of the nation’s exports. Győr’s central location
on the continent provides convenient access to numerous regional capitals.

SZE’s central campus is situated in Győr,
with teaching and research sites in Budapest and two other regional centres.
Since 2016, the University has seen a rapid rise in the number of international
students, now totalling over 1,000 and representing around 80 nations. Apart
from the 200+ Hungarian-taught academic programmes in nine Faculties and four
Doctoral Schools, the University offers over 50 English-taught programmes, with
STEM disciplines and Business & Economics dominating. Five double-degrees
