Another milestone in the history of our university is the year 2010, when our university obtained the status of a National Research University and was renamed into Kazan National Research Technological University (KNRTU) in 2011. Today university is the largest Russian center of higher education in technology. KNRTU offers 99 training areas and specialties including 68 Bachelor’s Degree programs and 31 Master Degree Programs. Over 30 thousand students from Russia and all over the world study at the University. KNRTU incorporates 15 educational and research institutes Today university is the largest Russian center of higher education in technology. KNRTU offers over 150 training areas in Bachelor’s and Master’s Degree Programs. Today Kazan National Research Technological University unites activities in education, research and innovations. The University comprises 15 academic and research institutes; enrolls over 26 thousand undergraduate and graduate students from the Russian Federation and CIS countries, 900 Ph.D. and 100 Post-Doc students from Russia and other countries; employs over 300 Full Professors, Doctors of Science and over 900 Associate Professors and Ph.Ds. Kazan National Research Technological University international partnership network comprises 88 universities and research organizations from over 35 countries in Europe, America and Asia. The University is one of the 6 Russian Universities, members of Eurasia Pacific University Network (UNINET). Research at Kazan National Research Technological University is based on long-lasting traditions of excellence in chemistry and technology Kazan and Russia have been proud of the last two centuries. There are 5 research priorities corresponding to strategic areas of economy development in the Russian Federation. These priorities are: Development Priorities of Kazan National Research Technological University corresponding to Russian Economy Modernization Perspectives Chemistry and Technology of Polymer and Composite Materials: Dynamic Thermoplastic Elastomers, "Green” Tires, Waterproof and Anticorrosive Materials, Plastics for Automobile Construction, Aircraft and Mechanical Engineering Chemistry and Technology of High Energy Materials: Special Materials for Defense Industry, Pyrotechnic Compositions, Advanced Propellants Integrated Processing of Hydrocarbon Resources: Application of Nanostructured Composite Materials; Wave and Plasma Chemical Processes, Supercritical Fluid Technology and Devices with Fundamentally New Design Features, New Catalytic Processes. Nanotechnology, Nanomaterials: Materials on The Basis of Ultra-Fine Powders of Inorganic and Organic Substances, Polymers, Composites, Liquid Crystals and Other Nanomaterials Energy and Resource Saving Technologies for Advanced Materials: Bioadditives to Fuels, Vortex Type Economizers, Catalytic Purifiers, Insulation Materials, Heat and Mass Transfer Equipment The leading university in petroleum gas chemical complex and light industry complex educational clusters of the region, Kazan National Research Technological University integrates education and innovations in these fields in the Republic of...

name: Khulna University of Engineering and Technology
Kindai University (Kinki University)
description:
Kindai University was founded in 1925 with its principle mission to conduct research and provide education relevant to the real world. Today, with over 30,000 students and over 6,000 faculty members on six campuses in and around Osaka, Japan’s second largest city, and in other parts of the country, Kindai University is widely recognized as one of Japan’s leading research institutions.

Kindai University is comprised of 14 faculties with 48 departments, 33 of which are science-based. In addition to the academic faculties and departments, the University supports 17 research facilities, which include the Fisheries Laboratory, the Atomic Energy Research Institute, and three affiliated hospitals, which treat over a million patients per year, and function as central medical institutes for the Kinki region of Japan.

name: Mahasarakham University
description: Located in Kantharawichai, in the north-eastern province of Maha Sarakham in Thailand, Mahasarakham University is a comprehensive public university made up of 16 faculties, 2 colleges, and 1 school for two campuses. It was originally established in 1963 as Mahasarakham Teachers Training College before gaining university status in 1994, and has since enjoyed considerable growth in its academic infrastructure, facilities and services.Mahasarakham offers a total of 202 undergraduate and postgraduate programs in a wide range of fields, and has the distinction of being the only Thai university to offer postgraduate programs in paleontology as well as a Bachelor of Arts in the Khmer language. There is a strong focus on research, and the university was the first in Thailand to open a Natural Medicinal Mushroom Museum, intended to be a learning center to expand people’s knowledge of natural medicinal mushrooms.Mahasarakham has around 41,000 students enrolled, and attracts international students from fellow Asian countries such as Japan and South Korea and further afield, such as the UK and the US. It offers several English-taught programs aimed at international students:

name: Manav Rachna International Institute of Research and Studies (MRIIRS)
description:
Established in 1997 (as Career Institute of Technology & Management),Manav Rachna International Institute of Research and Studies(MRIIRS, formerly MRIU, a NAAC Accredited ‘A++’ Grade Institution), ‘Deemed-to-be-University’ offers programs from Graduate to Doctoral level that are in tune with the market dynamics. MRIIRS offers UG, PG, Diploma Programmes and Ph.D. programmes in the broad areas of engineering, management, dental sciences, media, business-studies, commerce, physiotherapy, foods and nutrition, social-sciences, psychology, computer applications and other allied areas. MRIIRS has registered an all-round growth in academics, research and development, ISR, student support and progression, leadership and governance, environmental consciousness besides achievements in many other exemplary processes and procedures. Student centric pedagogical processes, interventions of ICT and contemporary educational technologies are part of the academic delivery. A large number of choice-based value-added courses and MOOCs are offered to the students with the purpose of expanding their frontiers of knowledge by these cross-domain movements. A Local Chapter of NPTEL-SWAYAM at MRIIRS has been recognized with a rating of ‘A’ based on the performance in NPTEL Online Certification courses. To promote a research culture as a testimony of its commitment towards excellence, Research Innovation and Incubation Policy augmented by necessary infrastructure, aids the eco-system to stimulate quality research in emerging areas.

NAAC “A++” Grade Accredited Institutions

Manav Rachna International Institute of Research and Studies (MRIIRS) is a NAAC “A++” Grade ( which is the highest grade awarded to high-performance universities in India) accredited institution. This is an acknowledgement and re-affirmation of the Institution's belief that quality education and excellence go a long way in transforming students’ lives.  The recognition makes MRIIRS the first private university in Delhi-NCR to be accredited with the most coveted NAAC ‘A++’ Grade.

National Board of Accreditation (NBA)

The two engineering programmes namely B.Tech- Computer Science and Engineering and Biotechnology and one management programme MBA have been accredited by the National Board of Accreditation under Tier I.

National  Accreditation  Board for Hospitals & Healthcare Providers (   NABH   )

Manav Rachna Dental College & Hospital is the 1st in Haryana and 3rd in North India to receive the prestigious NABH accreditation for dental healthcare services. The NABH accreditation signifies our commitment to providing safe, ethical, and patient-centric care, reflecting our relentless pursuit of quality in both service and education.

NIRF, MHRD acknowledges MRIIRS

MRIIRS has been ranked among the Top Educational Institutions of the country in the prestigious ‘India Rankings 2025’ by NIRF, Ministry of Human Resource Development, Govt. of India, and has been placed in 101-150 Rank band for Engineering and University category.

Times Higher Education (THE) Impact Ranked Institution

Manav Rachna International Institute of Research and Studies (MRIIRS) has earned top honours in the Times Higher Education Impact Rankings 2025. Ranked among the top institutions globally and in India across SDGs 1, 2, 3, 5, 6, 9, 11, 13, 14, and 15.

QS World University Rankings Online MBA 2026

MRIIRS has been placed in band 76-100 globally, 9th in Asia Pacific and 2nd in India after IIM Kozhikode with Overall Global Rank at 1 under Class Experience Indicator.

QS World University Rankings

Manav Rachna International Institute of Research and Studies (MRIIRS) makes its debut in the QS World University Rankings 2026 - among the top 1,501 globally, and one of just 8 new entrants from India, alongside IITs and top research institutions.MRIIRS ranks among India’s best - 7th in Faculty–Student Ratio, 19th in International Faculty, and top 25 in Student Diversity and International Students.

Founder Member of the Indian Alliance of the COLLEGE BOARD   :

Manav Rachna International Institute of Research and Studies (MRIIRS, formerly MRIU) is a Founder Member of the prestigious “College Board’s Indian Global Higher Education Alliance”. The Alliance provides a platform for innovative Indian universities to engage with the world’s most prominent universities to drive access and excellence in undergraduate preparation, recruitment, admission, and enrolment practices. Eminent Universities like Harvard University, Stanford University, University of Michigan, Ohio State University, Princeton University, Boston University, San Diego University, Yale University, Georgia University, Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Purdue University, Miami University, and Johns Hopkins University are College Board members. This makes Manav Rachna a front runner for a partnership that will pave the way for generating new knowledge and forward-thinking global ideas.

QS Sustainability Ranking 2026

Manav Rachna International Institute of Research & Studies ranked among Top 1501 Universities Worldwide, Ranked 582 in Asia & 68 in India.

QS International Trade Rankings

Manav Rachna International Institute of Research and Studies (MRIIRS) has been Globally Ranked at 55 with Top in India, No.2 in Asia and with 6th Rank globally under innovation Teaching. Under Trade Programme Content, MRIIRS has been Globally placed at 14th Position.

AICTE (All-India Council for Technical Education), DCI (Dental Council of India) and HSCP (Haryana State Council of Physiotherapy) Approved Programmes

MRIIRS is AICTE approved for Engineering, Management, and MCA programmes, all the Dental and Physiotherapy programmes of MRIIRS are approved by DCI and HSCP, respectively.

QUALITY ASSURANCE AND CONTROL

In keeping with its quality mission, Manav Rachna focuses not only on providing Quality Education in contemporary domains but also strives to make students independent in thought and action.  It lays great emphasis on quality through application orientation in its academic programs. The Quality standards of MRIIRS are driven and monitored by their Internal Quality Assurance Cell (IQAC) with the participation of all stakeholders.

name: Mapúa University
description:
Mapúa University, formerly known as Mapúa Institute of Technology, envisions itself to be among the best universities in the world. Since its founding on January 25, 1925, Mapúa unceasingly fosters its tradition of excellence in engineering, architecture, information technology, business, media studies, communication, psychology and education. To sustain its efforts in pursuing its vision, Mapúa has strategized to become a digital, research-driven, outcomes-based, and international domain (DROID).

In its relentless pursuit of excellence, Mapúa has subjected itself to local and international accreditations and certifications. To date, Mapúa has accreditation from ABET’s Engineering Accreditation Commission for 11engineering programs and from its Computing Accreditation Commission for three(3) computing programs. It has obtained the highest accreditation from the Philippine Technological Council Accreditation and Certification Board for Engineering and Technology Engineering Accreditation Commission (ACBET-EAC) for its chemical engineering, civil engineering, computer engineering, electrical engineering, electronics engineering, environmental and sanitary engineering, industrial engineering, and mechanical engineering programs. Moreover, the Philippine Commission on Higher Education (CHED) has recognized Mapua’s chemical engineering, civil engineering, computer engineering, electrical engineering, electronics engineering, environmental and sanitary engineering, mechanical engineering, and information technology as centers of excellence (COE), and the industrial engineering program as a center of development (COD), the most number among all Philippine engineering schools.

On May 18, 2017, the Philippine Commission on Higher Education (CHED) granted the university status to Mapúa pursuant to Memorandum Order No. 46, Series of 2012, “Policy-Standard to Enhance Quality Assurance (QA) in Philippine Higher Education through an Outcomes-based and Typology-based QA.”

After attaining the university status, Mapúa was awarded with an overall rating of four stars by the Quacquerelli Symonds (QS) Stars. It also obtained ISO 9001:2015 and ISO 14001:2015 certifications.

name: National Taipei University
description: Facing the rapid changes in the world and the competitive talents, we continue to advance toward “R&D-based teaching” and “practical application research”, and pursues new ideas of innovative research and development, driving practical innovation teaching and applying innovative teaching, so that students can learn in the learning process. At the same time, master the rapid pulse of society and become the pillar of the country in the future. We have Sanxia and Taipei Campus, own seven colleges including College of Law, College of Business, College of Public Affairs, College of Social Sciences, College of Humanities, College of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science and International College of Sustainability Innovations, total eighteen departments, five independent research institutes, twenty-two master programs, nine doctoral programs, eight master’s in-service special programs and nine extension education programs.

name: Manash Kozybayev North Kazakhstan university
description: The North Kazakhstan University named after Manash Kozybayev is one of the oldest educational institution in the Republic of Kazakhstan with 80 years of its existence.The NKU named after M.Kozybayev has the State license which gives the right to provide educational services: #KZLAA00018464 issued on Jule 22, 2020 by the Ministry of education and science of the Republic of Kazakhstan.In 2019 the NKU named after M. Kozybayev had been passed successful an institutional accreditation (certificate #AA0159 issued on May 24, 2019 by the IAAR) and a state certification procedure (Order #1692 issued on December 10, 2012 by the MES RK).The university is provided services by the 72 Bachelor’s Degree courses, 47 Master’s Degree courses and 6 Doctor’s Degree courses.

name: Universitas Negeri Padang
description: Universitas Negeri Padang (UNP) which developed at this time has gone through various periods. This period began with the Teacher Education College (PTPG) which was established in 1954 in Batusangkar until becoming the Padang State University (UNP) in 1999. Universitas Negeri Padang is headquartered in Padang City, West Sumatra, Indonesia. Today, UNP has developed into the 25th ranked University in Indonesia. UNP has 8 (eight) faculties. UNP is now a public university in the form of a Public Service Institution, UNP researchers focus on developing digital learning and traditional cuisine

name: Perm State National Research University
description:
Perm State National Research University is the oldest university in the Ural region. It was founded in 1916 and soon became the foundation for the higher education system of the West Ural. It is situated in Perm, the city that is popular with its ballet, wooden sculptures and annual big festivals. Entire geological period was named after Perm – Permian period. In 2010 Perm University was awarded the status of National Research University, justifying its reputation as one of the leading Russian universities.

Today more than 12 thousand students pursue their degree at 12 faculties. The University campus is like small European town. There are teaching blocks, clock tower, museums and the Botanic garden, culture center, libraries and gym halls. The University offers secondary-level vocational training, Bachelor’s, Master’s and PhD’s educational programs. There are Russian language courses for international students.

In October 2016 Perm State National Research University celebrated the centenary of its foundation and acquired the status of historical university.

http://www.psu.ru/

name: Pontificia Universidad Católica Madre y Maestra (PUCMM)
description:
PUCMM is the first private university of the Dominican Republic, founded in 1962.

PUCMM is centrally located in both its botanical-garden-like campus at kilometer 1.5 of Duarte’s freeway in Santiago de los Caballeros and in its urban styled campus at Lincoln Ave. and Bolivar Street in Santo Domingo.

Campus in Santiago is an icon of the city.  It occupies 950,0002  meters and it is an ecological lung of the region and a beautiful garden –campus that invites to study and to investigate.  It was designed to preserve the topography and the original beauty of the landscape and, at the same time, to create an appropriate environment to the development of academic and spiritual life of the students, teachers and other members of the university.

PUCMM is best known for the excellence of its study programs, students’ services, and the resulting preparation of its graduates. In addition, its postgraduate programs, many of which offer dual degrees in conjunction with prestigious foreign universities, present various opportunities for research and academic pursuits.

The main language of teaching is Spanish. There are some courses taught through the Foreign Languages Department in English. However, due to the strength of our English program, many of our Spanish-taught courses are able to use various printed materials in English.

name: Rajshahi University of Engineering and Technology
description: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology (RUET) is the prestigious public Engineering University & center of excellence offers high quality education and research in the field of engineering and technology. RUET is well balanced urban and natural environment and convenience. Rapid globalization, industrialization, presence of problems, depletion of natural resources, environmental damage, world financial insecurity, poverty, etc are the global challenge for human being as a whole. The university comprises engineering and sciences departments’ offers under-graduate and post-graduate degrees. Every year most brilliant students are enrolled for the undergraduate program through transparent and standard admission test. About 3000 students are pursuing their higher study in this green campus including under-graduate and post-graduate with over 200 prominent faculty members of diverse field of expertise. The university also receive a significant numbers of international students are continuing their higher study in this campus. The faculty members and students (UG & PG) of this university engaged with qualitative research work in a multiple research fields and well equipped modern laboratory environment. The faculty members invest their most of the time in research activities jointly with foreign faculties beyond their regular academic duties.

name: Rikkyo University
description:
A private university located within Tokyo in the Ikebukuro district, Rikkyo University is also known as St Paul’s University - a name which traces its origins back to 1794 when a European missionary founded a school for boys.

11 faculties exist at the university today, covering the following subject areas: Law and Politics, Arts, Intercultural Communication, Business, Science, Sociology, Economics, Tourism, Community and Human Services, Contemporary Psychology, and a Global Liberal Arts Program. Approximately 20,000 students are enrolled at the university, with the vast majority studying at undergraduate level. Slightly over 700 students are classified as international, while female students out-number male students.

name: Sakarya University
description:
Sakarya University (Sakarya Üniversitesi) can be found in the city of Adapazari, the capital of the Turkish province Sakarya.

Usually known simply as SAU, the public research university is considered one of the largest universities in Turkey.

Founded as Sakarya Engineering and Architecture in 1970, it was renamed as Sakarya State Engineering and Architecture Academy in 1971, then on July 3, 1992, Sakarya University was established by Law.

Sakarya University is a research-led institution with comprehensive graduate doctoral degree programs in Science, Technology, Engineering, and Humanities, as well as professional degrees in business, medicine, law, nursing, social work and dentistry.

The university consists of five different institutes: Educational Sciences, Natural Sciences, Health Sciences, Social Sciences, and Middle East Institute.

In Turkey, Sakarya University is the first and only state university to receive the ISO-2002 Quality Certificate and "the EFQM Excellence Quality Certificate of Competency Level".

The university has 53.405 students in total, consisting of: 41.548 degree students, 5.010 masters degree students, 5.243 associate degree students, and 1.604 PhD students. Whereas in the staff department there are 804 faculty members at Sakarya, 1.492 instructors and 316 administrative staff.

name: San Francisco State University
description:
San Francisco State University is known for having a wide range of students, as well as ranking fourth in the nation among master’s institutions that host international students and first among U.S. universities for the number of students who study abroad for an academic year.

The university offers undergraduate degrees in  77 academic areas and postgraduate degrees in  63 academic areas, as well as a doctorate in educational leadership.

San Francisco State University is dedicated to offering financial aid to its full-time students and 68% of students will receive some form of scholarships or financial aid. The average need-based grant award is $9,004.

name: Shakarim University of the City of Semey, Kazakhstan
description:
Shakarim
Universityis a modern educational, methodological, scientific and cultural
center of the north-eastern region of Kazakhstan. This is a multidisciplinary
university with a wealth of experience, it was established in 1934.

The university
has 9 high schools, where over 7000 people study in 45 bachelor's degree programs,
35 master's degree programs and 10 doctoral programs.

The university
is working on the implementation of student-oriented learning, the development
of a culture of academic integrity. Educational programs are aimed at both the
development of hard skills and soft skills. Students are given the opportunity
to acquire additional skills through minor programs. Shakarim University
adheres to the principle of equal rights to quality education for all students,
including those with special educational needs. The "Traveling
Student" program has been implemented with three universities of
Kazakhstan (NJC "Atyrau University named after H. Dosmukhamedov", NJC
"Karaganda University named after E.A. Buketov", NJC "Pavlodar
Pedagogical University") in order to increase the level of academic
mobility of students.

There is a
highly qualified teaching staff in demand, numbering about 1,000 teachers and
staff, including 13 academicians and corresponding members of international and
republican academies, 19 doctors of sciences, professors, 126 candidates of
sciences, 40 PhD, 143 undergraduates. 32 university scientists are holders of
the state grant "The best university teacher".

The university
implements 17 grant research projects,    6
joint innovative projects with enterprises of the country (for example, Huawei
Kazakhstan).

To ensure
effective work at the university, an electronic document management system has
been implemented.

Shakarim
Universityhas a high-quality educational and methodological and powerful material and
technical base. There are 12 academic buildings, educational and scientific
laboratories and workshops with modern equipment, a scientific library with a
rich book collection (more than 700 thousand books), with a media library and
an educational hall, a computer parking (more than 1300 computers), a swimming
pool and 2 gyms, 2 sports complexes with an equipped football field, 1 gym, a
medical center with medical and preventive equipment, a student house,
apartment-type dormitories.

Shakarim
Universityis a large university with extensive international relations. It cooperates
with universities in the USA, China, Mongolia, Germany, the Netherlands, Great
Britain, Japan, Turkey, the Czech Republic, Slovenia, Poland, Russia, the
Republic of Belarus, Ukraine and the Baltic Coast countries. It is a member of
reputable international organizations.

Shakarim
University is the 8th in the ranking of universities of Kazakhstan – 2022 by
scientific publications (IQAA-Ranking). According to the results of the
National Ranking of demand for universities of the Republic of Kazakhstan –
2021, conducted by the Independent Accreditation and Rating Agency (IAAR),
Shakarim University entered the TOP 10 best universities in Kazakhstan.

name: Shanghai Normal University
description:
A key university in Shanghai city, Shanghai Normal University (SHNU) is a comprehensive local university with salient features of teacher training and particular strength in liberal arts. The main undertakings of the university are undergraduate education with the chief aim of producing high level application-oriented talents.

Currently, SHNU has an enrollment of 22,505 full-time undergraduates, 2,827 graduates, 13,061 night school students and 682 long-term overseas students (studying here for more than one year). The university has established cooperation and exchange relationships with 182 universities and cultural and academic institutions in 25 countries and regions. For 50-odd years since its establishment, SHNU has trained more than 100,000 talents of various kinds.

Almost 70% of primary and middle school teachers, and almost 70% of school headmasters and principals are SHNU graduates. Among them there have been marvelous figures such as Tang Shengchang and Liu Jinghai, who are entitled Educational Heroes in Shanghai, Wu Xiaozhong and Gao Runhua, who are excellent school principals at state level, and Shanghai Teacher Ethic Models Tong Yingying and Zhang Yuqing. These people are representatives of excellent students graduated from SHNU and engaged in educational undertakings in our country.

name: Silpakorn University
description: Silpakorn University was originally established as the School of Fine Arts under the Fine Arts Department.The School gradually developed and was officially accorded a new status and name, Silpakorn University, on 12 October 1943. In the early phase of its development, only programs in painting and sculpture were offered by its inaugural faculty – the Faculty of Painting and Sculpture. Three more faculties were later established to accommodate the University’s growing academic interests, namely, architecture, archaeology, and decorative arts. These four areas of specialization formed the academic bases of the four faculties of the Wang Tha Phra Campus in Bangkok.Now Silpakorn has become a fully comprehensive university offering degree programs at both undergraduate and graduate levels in all major fields of art and design, science and technology, health science, social sciences and humanities. In addition, it also maintains a Graduate School, Art Galleries, an Art and Culture Center, a Computer Center, a Research and Development Institute, and other facilities and functional services. In 1999, a new faculty, the Faculty of Music, was established for formal degree training in both theory and practice of western music, including classical, popular, jazz, and commercial music.

name: SOKA University
description: Based in the Japanese capital of Tokyo, Soka University was designated as one of the country’s top global universities by the Japanese Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology in 2014. The Top Global University project was designed by the government to enhance the globalization of Japan’s universities to benefit their graduates. The hope is to encourage more international students to enroll in Soka University and the other institutions included in the project.More than 50,000 students have graduated from Soka University since it opened its doors to students at the start of the 1970s. The university name ‘Soka’ means ‘value creation’ and the university strives to create value in the wider world by following certain key principles. These include being the highest seat of learning for humanistic education and being a fortress for the peace of humankind.Over the years, the university has awarded honorary doctorates to notable political figures from around the world including Rosa Parks, Fidel Castro and Mikhail Gorbachev.

name: Soongsil University
description: Soongsil University's root trace back to 1897, when Dr. W. M. Baird, an American missionary started teaching from his residence in Pyong Yang and was then given the title of the first university in Korea. Later during the Japanese occupation and Korea lost its sovereignty, Soongsil University made national liberalization its top priority and took the lead in the national independence movement. In 1938, the school even decided to close down in protest against forced worship at Japanese shrines. Even throughout Korea's tumultuous history, Soongsil has always striven to be the first.

name: State University of Malang (Universitas Negeri Malang)
description:
Universitas Negeri Malang(UM), situated in the picturesque city of Malang, Indonesia, is a beacon of academic excellence and innovation. With a rich history dating back to its establishment in 1954, UM has evolved into a premier institution dedicated to nurturing the intellectual and personal development of its students.

Historical Roots:The roots of Universitas Negeri Malang trace back to its inception as a teacher training institute, reflecting its commitment to education from the very beginning. Over the years, it has grown into a comprehensive university with a diverse range of programs spanning the arts, sciences, education, and technology.

Academic Excellence:At the heart of UM's reputation is its unwavering commitment to academic excellence. The university boasts a distinguished faculty known for their expertise, passion, and dedication to imparting knowledge. The curriculum is designed to be dynamic and relevant, preparing students not only with a strong academic foundation but also with the practical skills necessary for success in their chosen fields.

Programs and Faculties:UM offers a wide array of undergraduate and graduate programs across multiple faculties, catering to diverse academic interests. From education and humanities to science and technology, each faculty is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities, ensuring students have access to the resources needed for a comprehensive and enriching learning experience.

Global Engagement:Universitas Negeri Malang understands the importance of a global perspective in today's interconnected world. The university actively fosters international collaborations, encourages student exchange programs, and hosts visiting scholars from around the globe. This global engagement not only broadens the horizons of UM students but also contributes to a vibrant and diverse campus community.

Campus Life:Life at UM is a vibrant and enriching experience. The campus is a bustling hub of activity, with students engaged in a myriad of extracurricular pursuits. From cultural festivals and sports events to academic competitions and community service initiatives, there is always something happening at UM. The university's commitment to holistic development is reflected in the variety of student clubs, organizations, and events that cater to diverse interests.

State-of-the-Art Facilities:UM takes pride in providing students with cutting-edge facilities that facilitate learning and research. Modern classrooms, well-equipped laboratories, and extensive libraries create an environment conducive to both collaborative learning and individual exploration. The commitment to investing in infrastructure underscores UM's dedication to providing a world-class education.

Innovation and Research:Innovation is a cornerstone of UM's identity. The university is a hotbed of research activity, with faculty and students actively contributing to advancements in their respective fields. Research centers and institutes within the university focus on addressing real-world challenges, fostering a culture of curiosity, creativity, and problem-solving.

Community Engagement:Beyond academic pursuits, UM instills a sense of social responsibility in its students. Community engagement programs and outreach initiatives allow students to apply their knowledge and skills to make a positive impact in the broader community. This emphasis on giving back reinforces the university's commitment to producing well-rounded individuals who are not only academically competent but also socially conscious.

Alumni Success Stories:The success stories of UM's alumni are a testament to the quality of education and the transformative experiences offered by the university. Graduates have gone on to make significant contributions in various fields, both nationally and internationally. Whether in education, research, business, or public service, UM alumni are recognized for their leadership and impact.

Vision for the Future:As Universitas Negeri Malang looks to the future, it continues to evolve and adapt to the changing landscape of higher education. The university's vision encompasses a commitment to staying at the forefront of educational innovation, preparing students to navigate the complexities of the 21st century.

In conclusion, Universitas Negeri Malang stands as a beacon of educational excellence, shaping the minds of future leaders, thinkers, and contributors to society. With a rich history, a commitment to global engagement, state-of-the-art facilities, and a vibrant campus life, UM provides a transformative educational experience that empowers students to reach their full potential and make a positive impact on the world.

name: Stefan cel Mare University of Suceava
description:
USV is an innovative and complex public higher
education institution, which offers undergraduate, master’s, doctoral and post-doctoral
programs and conducts scientific research in the fields of economics, technical
sciences, engineering and computer science, natural sciences, humanities and
health. The first university in Romania in terms of the number of patents and
inventions in the last decade, USV plays a key role in the development and
dissemination of scientific knowledge. Since its establishment in 1963, our
university has been a strong presence in a city of over 100,000 inhabitants,
with a decisive contribution to building a modern identity for the local
community, in the geopolitical context of regional development and cross-border
relations between Romania, Ukraine and the Republic of Moldova. Located in
Bukovina, North-Eastern Romania, USV  is
an innovative and comprehensive public higher education institution that
organizes bachelor’s, master’s, doctoral and postdoctoral programs and conducts
scientific research in the fields of Economic Sciences, Technical Sciences,
Engineering, IT, Natural Sciences, Humanities, and Health.

name: Suez Canal University
description:
The history of Suez Canal University dates back to 1976 when the university was established by the presidential decree no. 93 for 1976. Study began in 1977 in six faculties; namely, the faculty of science, the faculty of agriculture, the faculty of commerce, the faculty of engineering and technology (in Port Said) and the faculty of education (in Suez). In the 1980s and 1990s, steady expansion in the university has been going on with a new faculty opening its doors almost every year.

Today, there are 49588 students registered at the university studying in more than twenty faculties distributed in more than six Branches located in Ismailia, Port Said, and Suez and El-Arish. Two more faculties, one for arts and humanities and the other for fish, are to be established soon. Suez Canal University is looking forward to occupy a prominent place among higher education institutions based on its contribution to university education development and its interaction with its community through pioneering research associated with its community.

University Mission :We are university heading for its community aims to provide opportunities to its student for learning and education which capable of competition and provide work opportunities in its wide field at globalization era responding its community needs and eager to develop values within it without compromised to abandon our identity

name: Universitas Syiah Kuala
description: Universitas Syiah Kuala (recognizably abbreviated as USK) is one the oldest and largest public universities in Indonesia. The university was established in 1961 and it has been developing into one of the best Indonesian universities. It is located in Banda Aceh, Aceh Province, the northern end of Sumatra Island. Although USK affected by the 2004 Indian Ocean Earthquake and Tsunami, the development of USK has been accelerated through strong collaborations and partnerships with international organizations and donors with a fully support from the Indonesia government. USK has gained Accreditation Excellent from the National Accreditation Board for Higher Education (BAN-PT) and internationally recognizable (9th position from all Indonesian Universities in Webometrics). USK has tighten its connection with the prominent universities in the world through research and academic collaboration and mobility program. It has been well known as an international research university especially in Disaster management field. With 12 faculties, USK offers various program studies from undergraduate, master and doctoral programs. Most of the program studies have been ‘A’ accredited by the BAN-PT.

name: Tashkent University of Information Technologies named after Muhammad Al-Khwarizmi
description:
Study with us

Students looking for great engineering and computer
science programs need to look no further thanTashkent University of Information Technologiesnamed after Muhammad al-Khwarizmi.

At its founding in 1955, TUIT was initially a small community of
electrotechnical communications and science lovers eager to bring their
knowledge to bear on the world. Today, TUIT has evolved into an educational
behemoth, with some 2,000 faculty members and more than 26,067 undergraduate
and graduate students.Today, TUIT’s motto of“Build future with digital education”has taken it
far. Most university rankings place TUIT among the best universities in
Uzbekistan, and famous alumni include Abdulla Aripov Prime Minister of the Republic
of Uzbekistan, who graduated with a degree in electrotechnical communications
engineering in 1983.

Education Cluster

University shows the cluster character including 6
branches, 14 professional technical colleges, 6 academic lyceums, and non-degree
education centers. This means the university provides IT education for a variety of
ages and knowledge groups.

TUIT has campuses in 6 different cities of Uzbekistan,
which occupies an entire territory of the country with IT higher education and
research. These cities areSamarkand, Karshi, Urgench, Nukus, Fergana, and
Nurafshan.

TeachingTUIT is now an independent, coeducational endowed university organized into 9
faculties (Computer Engineering; Software Engineering; Cybersecurity;
Telecommunication Technologies; Television technologies; Radio and Mobile
Communication; Economics and Management it ICT; Vocational Education in ICT), and 62-degree  programs are taught in these faculties ;

For undergraduates, TUIT has a joint program with theBelarussian State University of Informatics and Radioelectronics. Based on the
2+2 scheme, the joint program offers major programs on Software engineering,
Programmable mobile systems, and artificial intelligence.

For graduates, the university cooperates with theKlagenfurt University of Austriato create talents in both hardware and software of information and communication technologies.

Student
life

Student life at TUIT serves up opportunities to
discover new interests and passions galore, through a wide diversity of social,
political, religious, and cultural activities. TUIT has more than 70 clubs and
societies, including engineering project teams, community service
organizations, and charitable projects. Approximately 30 percent of TUIT
undergraduates join a sports team, and with 33 variety sports, TUIT boasts one
of the broadest intercollegiate athletic programs in the country.

Alumni

As a graduate of TUIT, you will join a lifelong
community of more than 10,000 like-minded people from across the world. This
professional and social network provides a lifetime of support with clubs and
contacts across the world and a range of groups and resources online. For a
taste of what our alumni are doing today, see our monthly update where they
share their experiences, showcase their career paths, and impart their wisdom.

Collaborations
and international partnerships

The university established cooperation with 72
universities, 8 research centers, 14 enterprises, and organizations from 35 foreign countries (South Korea, Japan, Germany, France, the USA, India, etc.),
and 94 cooperation agreements and a memorandum of understanding were signed on mutual
understanding. Our students are crucial to our continued success and
development and, along with our staff, they forge research links through
regular travel and overseas exchanges.

name: Lublin University of Technology
description: From the moment of establishment the Lublin University of Technology has registered the 100-times increase of the student's number and offered modern and very useful specializations and courses. At present, there are ca. 11,000 persons, where 6,400 are full time students, 3,600 part time students, 500 post graduate participants and 90 PhDs. The University presents study courses within the first level (engineer and licentiate), second level (master) and third level (doctoral degree) as well as post graduate studies. The University also offers different study structure - post degree study courses and additional course for High School students and industry employees, who are willing to continue their vocational education. Over the past 50 years over 30,000 graduates left the University. Graduates can receive the degree of Engineer or Master of Engineering, and the academic degree of Doctor of Academic Sciences. Since 1994 LUT graduates may apply for the title of "European Engineer" offered by the Federation of the European Associations of Engineers. The academic year is divided in two semesters (winter semester since October 1st till the end of January and summer semester since middle of February till the end of June). Mid-term examinations take place in February, while final examinations in June.

name: The Herzen State Pedagogical University of Russia
The Islamia University of Bahawalpur,Pakistan
description:
The Islamia University of Bahawalpuris a public sector university in Bahawalpur, Pakistan, which was originally established by His Highness Nawab Sir Sadiq Muhammad Khan Abbasi - V as the Jamia Abbasia in 1925. Jamia Abbasia was upgraded to Jamia Islamia in 1963. The Jamia Islamia was converted into a Chartered University as“The Islamia University of Bahawalpur”in 1975, by the Provincial Assembly of Punjab under“The Islamia University of Bahawalpur Act 1975”.              The University has five campuses. Abbasia Campus, Baghdad-ul-Jadeed Campus, and Khawaja Fareed Campus are located in Bahawalpur and two sub-campuses are situated in Bahawalnagar and Rahim Yar Khan. To align with the modern needs and changing world, recently, the number of departments has increased from 26 to 129, offering more than 300 disciplines. At present around 1800 teachers including 550 PhDs are serving to provide the latest and quality education. Apart from conventional disciplines of religious affairs, languages, social and basic sciences, are being imparted in the areas of Allied Health Sciences, Agriculture, Business Administration, Computing, Education, Engineering, Fine Arts, Information Technology, Law, Pharmacy, Sports and Veterinary Sciences. The Islamia University Bahawalpur has various notable academicians, journalists, jurists, lawyers, literary figures, politicians, and sports people, among others as its alumni. The University values quality teaching and research compatible with national needs focusing onTHE IUBcore values –Tolerance,Honesty,Eco-friendly,Innovative,Understanding, and beingBeneficial.

The modern form of Jamia Islamia today exists as the best-emerging university with the title of “The Islamia University of Bahawalpur”. In Times Higher Education (THE) World University Rankings-202, the Islamia University of Bahawalpur has been declared as 1001+ best in the world, 1   st           in Pakistani universities in three Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), 3          rd           in “No Poverty”, 5          th           in “Affordable and Clean Energy”. In UI Green Matric World University Ranking-2020, the university ranked 25 among 53 Pakistani universities and 637          th           at the world level amongst 1000 international universities. The Islamia University of Bahawalpur had been scored 100% in the Higher Education Commission of Pakistan (HEC) Online Education Readiness Dashboard, ranked at 3          rd           position in Pakistan in 2019, in the annual research ranking of the world-renowned Nature Index, and at 11          th           position in the Higher Education Commission of Pakistan (HEC) ranking of universities in 2016. The university currently has more than 1,800 faculty members serving full-time and part-time, which includes 550 PhDs. 126 teaching departments are offering almost 300 disciplines, providing the latest educational facilities for around 46,000 students. The semester system has been introduced in all departments to bring the teaching standard of the University in harmony with international standards along with the recommended latest syllabi of the Higher Education Commission of Pakistan. 13 faculties are functioning in IUB, which include the Faculty of Agriculture & Environment, Faculty of Arts and Languages, Faculty of Computing, Faculty of Education, Faculty of Engineering & Technology, Faculty of Islamic Learning, Faculty of Law, Faculty of Management Sciences & Commerce, Faculty of Medicine & Allied Health Sciences, Faculty of Pharmacy, Faculty of Science, Faculty of Social Sciences and Faculty of Veterinary & Animal Sciences. In addition, five constituent colleges are also functioning which include the College of Agriculture and Environmental Sciences, College of Art and Design, College of Conventional Medicine, College of Engineering and Technology, and College of Veterinary and Animal Sciences. The university campuses were set up at Bahawalnagar and Rahim Yar Khan in 2005, providing quality higher education to local students at their doorstep.

name: The National Research University "Belgorod State University"
Universidad Autónoma de Baja California
description:
Foundedin 1957, the Universidad Autónoma de Baja California (UABC) hasconsolidated as one of the top higher education institutions in Mexico. TheUniversity is socially responsible and fulfils its mission of educating theyouth of Baja California and Mexico; promoting social and economic progress inthe region; bolstering community development, including socially vulnerablegroups, and leading the most important social causes.

Forcompeting among the top higher education institutions in Mexico and LatinAmerica due to its quality and academic appropriation, the Universidad Autónomade Baja California (UABC), was awarded the High Quality Recognition “QSStar” with a Three Star distinction, awarded by the British organizationQuacquarelli Symonds (QS).

name: Universidad Autónoma de Chile
description:
Based across three separate campuses in Temuco, Talca and Santiago, the Universidad Autónoma de Chile is home to approximately 22,000 students. A private university, the institution offers both undergraduate and postgraduate teaching, as well as diploma courses and doctoral studies.

Teaching at the university is split across seven different faculties: Health Sciences; Architecture and Construction; Business and Administration; Social Sciences and Humanities; Law; Education; and Engineering. The university also has 11 different research centers, including the Chilean Institute of Municipal Studies (ICHIEM).

Temuco, where the university was initially founded, is a city in southern Chile. Historically, the university has been a hub for tourism, agriculture, livestock and forestry, due to its location close to the Andean valleys, lakes and the coast. Today, a significant proportion of the city has Basque ancestry, while another distinctive feature is the presence of indigenous Mapuche residents.

name: Universidad Católica de Temuco
description: Located in the Chilean city of Temuco, the Temuco Catholic University is one of many Chilean universities to be featured in the QS Latin America University Rankings. Established in 1991, the university will soon be celebrating its 30th anniversary. Today, there are over 9,000 students enrolled at the university. It is one of two large universities in the city of Temuco, and students living here benefit from the city’s status as a tourism hub, thanks to its proximity to the Andean valleys and the coast. More information about the university can be found on their website.

name: ULACIT - Universidad Latinoamericana de Ciencia y Tecnología, Costa Rica
description:
Welcome to ULACIT, the Latin American University of Science and Technology!

Located in downtown San José, Costa Rica, ULACIT is a bilingual university leading higher education in the Central American region since 1987. We offer 53 undergraduate and 42 graduate programs in the Schools of Engineering, Information and Communication Technologies, Film and Animation, Business Administration, Health Sciences, Education, Law and International Relations, as well as 23 master’s degrees in Business Administration, Law, Education and Project Management.

Our offering of courses taught fully in the English language is ample; 70 courses taught regularly in the English language in the fields of Business, Political Science, International Relations, Liberal Arts and the Humanities.

Study in Costa Rica to cover more credits within a year on a 100% Project-based Education

We work anually with three quarterly academic periods (Spring, Summer and Fall), which have a 15-week duration each, with two week vacations between them. By enrolling in ULACIT, students can cover more credits within a year. Each course covers 45 to 60 contact hours per academic period, representing 3 to 4 US credits or 6 to 8 ECTS credits per course.

All our teaching strategies are project-based, with no traditional exams. Learning´s grounded on inquiry, research, case studies, problem-solving and service learning experiences, under the Teaching for Understanding (TfU) framework, developed by Harvard University’s Project Zero.

Study Abroad with us and choose from the following Academic Programs:

- Regular Degree Courses or Enrollment on our academic programs taught 100% in the English language  from our International Relations, Business Management and Liberal Arts and Humanities Academic Programs- Summer Programs in International Business and Sustainable Development Studies (two seasons spanning from late May to early August)- Spanish Language Immersion Program (Seven levels of language proficiency. Available Courses: January 4-Week; June 4-Week; July 4-Week; August 4-Week; September 4-Week)

Our Global Education Office also develops customized academic programs and global education experiences that cater to the specific needs of institutions, third party-providers, faculty-led initiatives or specific student groups.  Whether you want to offer a course taught by your own faculty or a customized course in an area of interest, ULACIT provides the expert academic support, resources, and flexibility you need to create your own study abroad experiences in Costa Rica.

Join ULACIT to expand on your study abroad experience combining academic lessons, student active learning experiences, community and cultural engagement with leisure trips to Costa Rica’s world renowned natural sites.

For enrollment information please visit the following link: www.ulacit.ac.cr or write to us at[email protected]

name: Universidad Metropolitana
description: The Universidad Metropolitana is a private non-profit institution that was launched in 1970. It is an avant-garde study center with headquarters in Caracas. Some of its objectives is the training of professionals in enterprising skills and a commitment to the social development in Venezuela. Its academics are divided into four colleges: Engineering, Economic and Social Sciences, Arts and Sciences, and Law and Political Sciences. It currently has 15 B.A degrees, 7 Master’s degrees, 11 graduate certificates and a large outreach program. This academic offer is based on a model of education on values in which interdisciplinary activities and technologic support are considered essential for building human development. UNIMET contributes to the development and improvement of the quality of life of communities, seeking excellence and relevance in its intellectual and technical production, promoting modern environmental management and conservation of natural resources. Since 2002, UNIMET has a program of full scholarships for students with high academic performance and limited economic resources. In 49 years of activities, it has an alumni community of over 28,657 undergraduates and graduate students.

name: Universidad Nacional Agraria la Molina
description: The Universidad Nacional Agraria La Molina (UNALM) is a land grant university specialized in agriculture, agro industry, natural resources, and the enviroment. With over one hundred years of history, it holds an extensive academic tradittion in agro-national services, and is an emblematic imagen in Peru and overseas. Its extensive campus of 1200 hectares of green areas provides a user-friendly academic enviroment with fully equipped classrooms, a unique agricultural library, and numerous research laboratories. La Universidad Nacional Agraria La Molina has a well trained staff of more than 500 faculty members and a diverse student population, comprised of 5000 undergraduate and 1200 graduate students.

name: Universidad Nacional de San Martín (UNSAM)
description: The University of San Martín is a vibrant community of scholarship and learning that provides a stimulating environment for research, education and cultural activities. Established by law in 1992, UNSAM is a public university which boasts undergraduate and graduate education in the Arts and Humanities (School of Humanities, Mauricio Kagel Institute and Institute for Research in Cultural Heritage), the Social Sciences (School of Political Science, School of Business and IDAES), and Engineering and Natural Sciences (School of Science and Technology, 3IA, IIB, INCALIN, Sabato Institute and the Institute for Rehabilitation).

name: Universidad Nacional del Sur
description:
Universidad Nacional del Sur, UNS is the largest national university in southern Argentina. Its motto is Ardua Veritatem, which means "through the difficulties to the truth".

The university was founded on January 5, 1956, and absorbed what had been Instituto Tecnológico del Sur, ITS a former National University of La Plata affiliate established in 1946. Located in the city of Bahía Blanca, the school became the seventh in Argentina's national university system.

The main university complex is located at Alem 1253, where most of the Departments and laboratories operate as well as the Central Library.

name: Universidad Tecnológica Centroamericana (UNITEC)
description:
About Universidad Tecnológica Centroamericana (UNITEC)

A private
university in the Central American country Honduras, theUniversidad
Tecnológica Centroamericana (UNITEC)has been rated 4 stars
in theQS Stars University Ratings system, earning the maximum five
stars in the categories assessing teaching, employability & online
learning. UNITEC is also ranked among the top 300 universities in the
QS University Rankings: Latin America.

Study at
UNITEC

As well as
undergraduate, postgraduate and doctorate courses, UNITEC also offers technical
and vocational training programs in its two campuses located in the cities of
Tegucigalpa and San Pedro SulaUNITEC runs degrees in a wide variety of subjects, ranging from gastronomy to
energy to mechatroncs engineering.

For more
information visit our website:  unitec.edu

name: Universidad de Cuenca
description:
The University of Cuenca is a public educational institution governed by the principles established in the Constitution of the Republic of Ecuador and in the Organic Law of Higher Education, for humanism, freedom, inclusion and non-discrimination, gender equity, creative and plural thinking, free education up to the third level, accountability and equal opportunities for teachers, researchers, students, servers and workers. Our values are commitment, transparency, excellence, loyalty, innovation, and equity.

We are the only public educational institution in Ecuador that offers undergraduate courses in all areas of knowledge. We offer 51 undergraduate degree programs, 30 masters degree programs and 1 doctoral program. Additionally we have a language instituto and a strong connection with the community.

name: Universidad de Guanajuato
description:
Located in the Mexican state of Guanajuato, the Universidad de Guanajuato has around 33,828 students in programs ranging from high school level to doctorate level – while over 17,046 students pursue undergraduate, masters, and doctorate degrees.

There are 153 academic programs on offer, including 13 doctorates, 39 masters programs, and 65 bachelor's degrees. University schools can be found in 14 cities across the state of Guanajuato.

The university can trace its history back to the educational institution the Hospice of the Holy Trinity, established on October 1, 1732.

On August 29, 1827, the school changed its name to the College of the Immaculate Conception and fell under government responsibility. Programs available included Mining, Law, Painting, Sculpture and Architecture, and some years later in 1831, a library was established.

Over the subsequent decades, technical programs and research grew rapidly at the school. Finally, in 1945, the college changed its name to the University of Guanajuato, and the school was granted autonomy by state legislature on May 21, 1994.

Culturally, the state is best known for the annual Festival Internacional Cervantino in October. The event sponsors global artistic and cultural events. Revelers can enjoy opera, theater productions, films, art exhibitions, academic, concerts and dance recitals.

name: Universidad de Panamá - UP
description:
La Universidad de Panamá es la primera Institución de Educación Superior del país, oficialmente reconocida, fundada en 1935. Como tal, ha desempeñado un indiscutible liderazgo en la construcción de nuestra patria. Es la entidad de referencia nacional, con el mayor número de profesionales y expertos del país, quienes han ocupado puestos de altas jerarquías, como la Presidencia de la República. Cuenta con presencia en todo el territorio nacional, con 10 Centros Regionales Universitarios, 5 Extensiones Universitarias; y desarrolla su oferta académica en las áreas comarcales del país, lo que le permite cumplir su misión de formar a los profesionales y técnicos requeridos por la nación.

Su oferta académica abarca todas las áreas del conocimiento, siendo esta la Universidad
a la que tienen acceso los que menos tienen, le dan la prerrogativa de ser
reconocida en latitudes endógenas y exógenas.

Es una universidad estatal y actualmente cuenta con 228 edificios, los cuales incluyen 19 facultades, con una oferta académica de 171 carreras de pregrado y 141 programas de postgrado incluyendo programas de Maestrías y Doctorados.

name: Universidad de Piura
description:
The University of Piura (UDEP) is located in Peru, the Latin American country with the highest levels of economic growth in recent years. Founded in 1969, UDEP provides quality education, promotes research and trains professionals capable of transforming society. One of the ten best universities in Peru, UDEP is renowned for its high level of academic rigor, personalized education and promotion of values. These characteristics have resulted in UDEP graduates being highly sought after in today’s competitive labour market. UDEP’s established professional network further complements the ongoing work and development of its students, teachers and graduates. Currently there are more than 100 exchange opportunities with universities in 25 countries worldwide. Moreover, a strong relationship with local and foreign institutions has been achieved through various important scientific and technological research projects.  With campuses in Piura and Lima UDEP has, in total, seven faculties, sixty-one academic programs and the School of Management PAD. A major city in Northern Peru, Piura offers a pleasant and conducive centre for study and work. Our Lima campus is located in Miraflores, the hub of commercial activity in the capital, and offers an array of academic, cultural and social activities.

[Español] La Universidad de Piura está ubicada en Perú, el país latinoamericano con mayor crecimiento económico en los últimos años. Creada en 1969, la UDEP intenta dar una educación de calidad, impulsar la investigación y formar profesionales capaces de transformar la sociedad.La Universidad de Piura forma parte de las 10 mejores universidades del Perú. Es reconocida por su intenso clima laboral, su alto nivel de exigencia académica, educación personalizada y el fomento de los valores en sus alumnos.El Network profesional que mantiene la UDEP con profesores, conferencistas y graduados permite el desarrollo óptimo del trabajo propio. Además, los estudiantes y docentes cuentan con más de 100 oportunidades de intercambio con universidades de 25 países en el mundo.La UDEP tiene entre sus fines tanto la investigación científica y tecnológica así como labores de servicio y extensión universitaria, que realiza con instituciones nacionales y extranjeras, con las que mantiene fuertes vínculos de colaboración.  La UDEP cuenta con 7 facultades, 61 programas de pregrado y posgrado, y la Escuela de Dirección PAD, distribuidas en sus dos sedes: Lima y Piura. Su ubicación estratégica en Piura la convierte en un centro agradable y propicio para el estudio y la investigación universitaria. Su sede en Lima, hace de la UDEP, el centro con mayor conexión al principal eje comercial y laboral de la ciudad, con acceso a infinidad de actividades académicas, culturales y sociales.

name: Universidad de Tarapaca
description: Founded in 1981, Universidad de Tarapacá is a higher education institution located in Arica, Tarapaca and was founded in 1981. The university offers both undergraduate and postgraduate programs in several areas of study.

name: Universidad del Bío-Bío
description:
University of Bío-Bío (Universidad del Bío-Bío) is a university in Chile. It is part of the Chilean Traditional Universities.

The University of Bío-Bío is the heir of the tradition of public higher education in the Bío Bío Region. Its roots go back to the creation of the Technical University of the State (TUS) on April 9, 1947, and to the Ñuble Campus of the University of Chile. Then the Concepción Campus of the TUS and the campus from Chillán, derived in the Bío Bío University and the Chillán Professional Institute, originating what today is called the UBB.

With offices in Concepción and Chillán, its mission is to generate, apply and communicate the knowledge in sciences, technology, arts and humanities, forming competent, integral and reflexive professionals to answer the regional and national needs, to serve society with excellence and quality.

It offers 35 undergraduate degrees and two bachelor programs, with over 10.000 students and almost 70 percent of its professors hold masters or PhD grade. It has explored continuous education and graduate studies, contributing to the formation of advanced human capital in regions.

name: Universidad del Zulia
description: Located in the Venezuelan city of Maracaibo, the University of Zulia is one of the largest universities in Venezuela. Having originally been established towards the end of the 19th century, the university was ordered to close for political reasons in 1909 and didn’t reopen until 1946. Today, the university offers degree programs across 11 different schools, covering subjects as varied as veterinary medicine, architecture, law, and seven different fields of engineering. Teaching is split across three campuses, two of which are based in Zulia State. The third is in the city of Punto Fijo, in Falcón State.

name: Universidade Federal de Uberlândia
description:
The Federal University of Uberlândia (UFU) is a foundation of higher education, linked to the Indirect Public Administration, with corporate entity and of private law. The UFU aims to promote undergraduate and graduate education, delivering to society citizens socio-economic-environmentally minded, able to discuss the actual historic moment and to effectively contribute to the improvement of social and technological demand of the society.

The constitution of the Knowledge goes through lots of things, by observation, researching, experimentation. These activities get stronger with a perspective of a future where it can count with the formation of more conscientious, creative and critic professionals, capable to stand up against uncertain and risks, looking after the common wealth.

For more than four decades, UFU built and consolidated adequate structures for its activities, part of them distributed throughout seven campuses.

The University has 28 schools and institutes of three main fields:

a) Biomedical sciences

b) Engineering and technology

c) Business and Humanities

UFU offers 77 undergraduate courses, 37 masters programs and 19 PhD courses, distributed in different areas of knowledge.

name: Universidade Federal do Rio Grande do Norte (UFRN)
Universitas Andalas
description:
Universitas Andalas (UNAND)is an Indonesian state university located in Padang City in West Sumatra with a community of more than 32,000 students.

Offering 156undergraduateandpostgraduateprogrammes, Universitas Andalas was inaugurated in 1956 and ranked fourth in Indonesia according to the country’s Ministry of Research and Technology.

Surrounded by the natural beauty of the Indian Ocean and the Minankabau Hills, Universitas Andalas has ambitions to become aleading global universityover the next decade.

name: Universitas Islam Indonesia
description: Universitas Islam Indonesia (UII) is one of the leading private universities in Indonesia.Inspired by the spirit of nationalism and guided by perennial values, UII was founded one month before the proclamation of Indonesian independence in 1945. UII now has grown into a great place for learning. Located in the northern outskirt of Yogyakarta, the heart of Javanese culture, the main campus overlooks the stunning beauty of Merapi volcano, which is a perfect place to study.As a pioneer of national higher education in the country, UII is strongly rooted in the tradition of academic freedom, where the diversity of thoughts is highly respected. With a vibrant learning environment and a flair for innovation, we are committed to nurturing students to be innovative global leaders.The fruits of innovation are diverse. More than 84.000 UII alumni are serving Indonesia and the world at large in many fields and many ways while maintaining professionalism and ethical values, to which UII vision is anchored.

name: Universiti Sultan Zainal Abidin
description: Universiti Sultan Zainal Abidin

name: University of Da Nang
description:
Established in 1994, the University of Danang
(UD) is now the biggest university in Central Vietnam. UD consists11 member
universities and affiliated training units and is a multi-level,
multi-disciplinary university with the main strengths in Engineering,
Technology, Economics, Education and Foreign Languages. For nearly 45
years, UD has provided the Central-Highlands region and the whole country with
a large resource of leaders, managers, experts and entrepreneurs in many key
fields of engineering - technology, economics - law, social sciences and
humanities, education, language - culture, medicine. Alumni, postgraduate
students and PhD students of UD are successful and have held key positions and
responsibilities in agencies, organizations, schools and businesses that have
contributed significantly to the socio - economic development of the region and
the country.

UD is also one of the very first educational
institutions in Vietnam that have engaged in the national higher education
accreditation system and has24 educational programs accredited
internationally(as of 03/2021).Four member universitiesof the UD have
been recognized toreach the national accreditation standard(10/2016). Moreover,the UD-University of Science and Technology(UD-DUT) has become one of
four universities in Vietnam toreach the international accreditation
standardby the French High Council for Evaluation of Research and Higher
Education (HCÉRES).

UD has continuously expanded collaboration
with domestic and international partners and is also a member of different
organizations and international university networks. Till 2020, UD has
established long-lasting relationships and signed367 MoUs(Memorandum of understanding) withmore
than 250 international prestigious partnerssuch as Australia, Belgium,
Cambodia, the Czech Republic, Canada, China, England, Finland, France, Germany,
Hungary, India, Ireland, Italy, Japan, Korea, Laos, Lithuania, Malaysia, New
Zealand, Norway, Portugal, Romania, Russia, Singapore, Spain, Taiwan, Thailand,
the United States of America, etc…

UD has hostedmany
international research projects:

Over recent years, UD has always ranked high
amongst Viet Nam’s top universities; especially two consecutive years (2020
& 2021)in the top 401-450 Asian best universitiesaccording to QS
Asia University Rankings.

With the orientation to develop UD into a
research university, the research activities have been promoted in line with
technology transfer to serve the community needs and interests. Regarding the international
publication, on average, there arenearly 800 international articles every
year, of which nearly 200 are in prestigious ISI and SCOPUS lists. Additionally,
UD has been effectively operating33 Teaching-Research Teams(TRT); investing
and developing asynchronous and efficient infrastructure witha number of
research centers, modern laboratoriesand deploying many works and
inventions (26 patentsthat have been registered for intellectual
property).

With the mission and great responsibility
trusted by the Government and the Ministry of Education and Training, UD has
been continuing to affirm its international quality and prestige, making an
important contribution to the process of internationalization and innovation in
the national higher education.

The University of Danang, the incubator for
intellectual and talented people, always warmly welcomes you!

name: University of Hawaii at Hilo
description: The University of Hawaii at Hilo is a growing university of 4,000 students that offers a wide range of liberal arts and professional programs, as well as a number of graduate and doctoral programs. We are looking to the future and preparing our students to make lifelong contributions to their communities and help build a prosperous future. UH Hilo offers an exceptional campus and island setting in which to live and study. The university community enjoys a rich diverse student population, with a unique blend of local, mainland and international students, all living and learning together in a harmonious and safe environment. The surrounding island community, rooted in an agriculture history, is one of the most ethnically diverse in the country. The island landscape, too, is extraordinarily diverse, with snow-capped mountains, windy deserts, lush rainforests, endangered coral reefs, protective estuaries, active volcanoes and more. Most importantly, we live in the home of our indigenous host culture, and everything we do supports the infusion of Hawaiian values of cultural knowledge and language.

name: University of Missouri Saint Louis
description:
The University of Missouri Saint Louis was founded in 1963 and now has more than  95,000 alumni, which surpasses any other university in the region. Moreover, the university has been named one of "America's Best Colleges" by Forbes Magazine.

The university offers many sources of financial aid and has been recognized as one of four public Missouri schools that had an annual tuition under $20,000 and an average starting salary of over $40,000.In addition to this, the university of Missouri Saint Louis offers numerous types of scholarships and grants like: Freshmen Merit Scholarship, Non-resident Merit Scholarship, Transfer Merit Scholarship, as well as Federal grants.

name: University of Sri Jayawardenapura
description: The University of Sri Jayewadenepura has an approved research strategy  operated through the faculty of graduate studies which act as an  umbrella for research activities conducted by all the faculties. Faculty  of graduate studies (FGS) youngest faculty of the university which  established in 1996 under the provisions of the faculty of graduate  studies Ordinance No. 3 of 1987. Intention of this faculty is to bring  all the postgraduate research program under its purview in order to  upgrade the standards and also to allow interactive studies among  different research fields.

name: University of Tripoli
description: The Libyan University was establishedby a Royal Decree on 15th December 1955; the first faculty to befounded was the Faculty of Arts and Education in Benghazi.  In 1957, the Faculty of Science was opened tobecome the core of the Libyan University in Tripoli.  In 1966, the Faculty of Agriculture was founded.  In 1961, the United Nations Educational,Scientific and Cultural Organization (The UNESCO) established the College ofHigher Technical Studies which was incorporated in 1967 to the LibyanUniversity as the Faculty of Engineering.  In 1973, the Libyan University was dividedinto two: University of Benghazi and University of Tripoli.  In 1976, the name of the University ofTripoli was changed to Al Fatah University. Medical Colleges became known as Al Fatah University for MedicalSciences.  In 2012, the Universityregained its original name and the establishment of new faculties has reachedto twenty faculties up to date.

name: University of West Bohemia
description: The University of West Bohemia in Pilsen (UWB) is the only public institution of higher education based in the Pilsen Region. Currently, the University has eight faculties consisting of more than sixty departments and three institutes of higher education. More than 16,000 students studying at the University can choose from a wide of range of undergraduate, postgraduate and doctoral study programs, the choice of form of study, i.e. a full-time, part-time or combined form, being a matter of course. The educational activities at the University of West Bohemia in Pilsen include life-long learning programs for the general public in the form of lectures, courses and comprehensive training programs, including the popular Third-Age University. In addition to its educational activities, the University is also an important centre of Research and Development, with massive investment in University development and construction activities on the University campus. The University campus, in particular, is currently undergoing very dynamic changes – with an annex to the University Library building, and new buildings of the European Centre of Excellence NTIS and the Centre of Technical and Natural Science Education and Research literally growing in front of our eyes.

name: Voronezh State University
description:
Voronezh State University (VSU) has a well-established reputation for excellence in teaching and research and is consistently ranked amongst the top Russian Universities by both government and independent surveys. VSU was ranked 701+ in the latest QS World Universities Rankings and 111-120 in the BRICS Rankings. The school offers Bachelor’s degree and Master’s degree programs in the following faculties:Applied Mathematics, Informatics and MechanicsBiology and Soil SciencesChemistryComputer SciencesEconomicsGeography, Geoecology and TourismGeologyHistoryInternational RelationsJournalismLawMathematicsMilitary EducationPharmaceuticsPhilologyPhilosophy and PsychologyPhysicsRomance and Germanic Philology.The City of Voronezh, founded in 1584, is large and bustling yet has its own charm of an old provincial town. Conveniently located within an overnight train journey from Moscow, Voronezh is the best destination for those who are looking for a truly Russian experience.

name: Walailak University
description:
Walailak University (WU) is a comprehensive university, located in Nakhon Si Thammarat, that serves the people of Thailand and ASEAN. The University is comprised of 14 faculties, a graduate school and three international colleges. The faculties include science, engineering, medical and pharmaceutical sciences, nursing, public and allied health, arts & humanities, informatics, management, architecture, law and political science. WU is committed to excellence in teaching with programmes aligned to UK-PSF principles with over 240 lecturers fellows, senior fellows or principle fellows of the Higher Education Academy, the highest in Thailand. Close to 9,000 students from 19 different countries make up our broad and inclusive student body.

As one of only 14 universities in Thailand to be named a Frontier Research University, WU serves as an important center of research and innovation, tackling problems of global interest, and those of direct relevance to the local community. Much of this research is undertaken through WU’s 21 Centers of Excellence which cover fields from science to medicine to societal and ecological endeavours, often underscored by sustainability principles. Close cooperation between the University and local businesses helps to nurture small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs). Working with our international and local partners we aim to be a source of knowledge for critical problems facing the nation, to unfailingly address community needs, and to strive for international recognition for excellence.

For more information please see: https://www.wu.ac.th/en

name: Youngsan University
description: A private university in the south-east region of South Korea, Youngsan University’s main campus can be found in Yangsan City. However, the university also has a branch campus in nearby Busan as well as an auxiliary center in the South Korean capital, Seoul.Across these various locations, Youngsan University offers education in a range of practical fields. At undergraduate level, this includes international studies, law, and Asian business. At postgraduate level, degrees are available in subjects such as hotel tourism management and real estate, as well as teaching English in a foreign language.Yangsan City has a population of close to 350,000 people, making it a much quieter place to study and live than some of the major cities in South Korea. Students living here are encouraged to visit some of the city’s most notable tourist attractions, such as Tongdosa Temple and Yangsan Tower. Students based in Busan can travel between the two cities by bus.
